text: But, what I want is the pure spirit.{nl}I want you to put the two soul stones into the sacred box and purify them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150714_000235
text: The gold plate which you found for me just a while ago.. I think there are more parts besides it.{nl}They are all the gold plates that I've found so I don't have any other plates.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150714_000236
text: Ah, there is one other place that we haven't searched yet. Folsas Highway.{nl}Can you go there for me?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150714_000237
text: Is everything going alright?{nl}Maybe, I haven't thought deeply enough.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150714_000238
text: These are research materials. Tell Cryomancer Master that you are handing over these on behalf of Gitis.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150714_000239
text: There is a gigantic monster that controls those wood goblins.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150714_000240

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150714_000241
text: It is very strong. Be careful.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150714_000242
text: If you face it, I hope you are with other people.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150714_000243
text: I didn't expect that you would defeat it..{nl}You are much stronger than I expected. I am surprised.{nl}If I am with you, regaining the control of the monastery won't be that hard.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150717_000292
text: Collect any useful information at the Fortress of the Land.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000293
text: That was close. My name is Kupole Meile.{nl}I came to guide the petrified souls in this place.{nl}But I'm afraid more Petrifying Frost like the one from before will suddenly appear, so I haven't been able to move much.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000294
text: {nl}There are Petrification Detectors, but it seems some of them aren't working...{nl}Will you inspect the detectors for me?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000295
text: A long time ago demons and goddesses kept their powers to themselves.{nl}They kept from interfering in each other's areas.{nl}Then one day the demons casted this petrification curse.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000296
text: Petrification detectors were installed throughout the area.{nl}The first one you saw earlier seems to be working, but you should have a look at the others.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000297
text: If only all the detectors were working...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000298
text: Oh, I see.{nl}So two of them aren't working.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000299
text: Problems with the detectors are best reported to the Royal Army.{nl}They're the ones who installed them.{nl}Royal Army Officer Retia should be able to help, I think.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000300
text: After the demons cast the petrification curse on this land... the goddesses did try to save us.{nl}But the demons were furious about them interfering with their work and left for another region...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000301
text: {nl}The disaster they caused was unimaginable...{nl}It was so bad it forced the goddesses to give up on saving this petrified land...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000302
text: Retia is at Verkti Square.{nl}Hm? You already knew?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000303
text: The Petrification Detectors at the Coastal Fortress aren't working.{nl}I'm aware of that. They were broken.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000304
text: Isn't someone there, though? I sent some backup to fix the broken detectors.{nl}It's been a while since they left, too... I wonder what happened...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000305
text: {nl}Will you look for them?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000306
text: Seeing how there's no news of them, though... Something could have happened.{nl}I know it isn't easy, but if you find their bodies... will you look through them?{nl}They should be carrying useful parts. If not, try the monsters nearby...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000307
text: The Petrifying Frost at the entrance to Coastal Fortress is being reported on quite often, so you should be careful of monster attacks and Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000308
text: The backup forces are all gone... It's a shame...{nl}Their spirits will need to be guided too...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000309
text: Okay. Anyways, please take those parts and fix the broken detector.{nl}We should do it, but please understand that we can't leave here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000310
text: Those are the parts.{nl}You should go and fix the detectors now.{nl}Beware of Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000311
text: After all the detectors are back to normal I want to guide the spirits to their rest place.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000312
text: Please, do me this favor.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000313
text: Oh, all of them are working now.{nl}Thank you.{nl}I can finally start guiding the spirits now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000314
text: I'm worried there's so many spirits...{nl}But I still plan to guide them one by one.{nl}May your path be blessed by the goddesses.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000315
text: Who're you? Stay back.{nl}Or... Maybe if you can help me...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000316
text: Priest Juta

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000317
text: Wow. I never thought I'd meet someone at this cemetery.{nl}I'm a Bokor serving Goddess Zemyna. After she went missing I followed Her trace all the way here.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000318
text: I heard Goddess Zemyna was hiding and that she had blessed the Order of the Tree of Truth,{nl}but now that I'm here all I see are dead bodies.{nl}I can't control them with my power, either. I might have to get rid of them, they're interfering with my prayers...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000319
text: Really? Thank you for your words.{nl}Prayers were hard to do alone.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000320
text: Please take care of the bodies around here, then.{nl}Meanwhile I'll be preparing and praying to the goddess.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000321
text: I thought I'd find something here, but these corpses don't respond to my Bokor powers...{nl}I never saw something like this. I need to find the goddess...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000322
text: Oh, you're back. Thanks to you I was able to pray properly.{nl}I mean... There's no answer like before but...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150729_000323
text: I'll inspect them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150908_000381

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150918_000382
text: Did the Archer Master send you here?{nl}Klaipeda is becoming stable, but Fedimian is still like this.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150918_000383
text: I want you to get rid of the boss monsters at Mage Tower.{nl}We don't have enough workforce to reconstruct Fedimian and the monsters are also coming out from the tower.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150918_000384
text: According to the report of the scout who succeeded in infiltrating into the tower, it was Minotaurus at the 3rd floor of Mage Tower.{nl}If we could defeat that monster, it will be an enough warning.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150918_000385
text: Well Done. The monsters' force has reduced a bit as a result. {nl}Please pass my appreciation to Archer Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150918_000386
text: Thanks. {nl}As a Cleric Master, I will help you to fulfill bigger mission.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150918_000387
text: There are nests of monsters at the right side of this four way.{nl}There may be some of our colleagues who are still alive.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150918_000388
text: Of course, I should repay you first as a Squire Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150918_000389
text: The Collection of the collectors

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150918_000390
text: Defeat the monsters that are blocking the way!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150918_000391
text: You've defeated all the monsters that are blocking the way!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150918_000392
text: Talk with the collector

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20150918_000393
text: Obtained the collections

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000394
text: So you are the Revelator who dreamt of the dream of the goddesses.{nl}I am Uska, the Knight Commander in charge of both Siauliai and Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000395
text: The kingdom lost all hope.{nl}Without the will to stand up again.. calling at the name of the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000396
text: To tell you the truth, I can't just see you Revelators positively.{nl}Since I am in charge of one city..{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000397
text: We should not experience the depression again.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000398
text: Anyways, the bishop also dreamt of the revelation.{nl}He told me that when the Revelator comes, he should go to Crystal Mine.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000399
text: But, since the mine village is fighting against Vubbes, we are restricting the entrance.{nl}The knight, Aras at the east forest is in charge so meet him.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000400
text: The reason why the number of monsters increased in this forest was due to Vubbe fighters.{nl}Please find out how many Vubbes are here.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000401
text: Hey. You're that famous Revelator, aren't ya?{nl}Seems like you're interested in the Fortress of the Land.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000402
text: This is, the place is full of soldiers from the Royal Army, you can't just walk in.{nl}Now. Whose side are you on?{nl}If you want to enter the Fortress of the Land, you better tell me.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000403
text: Be careful not to get detected by kingdom soldiers.{nl}Even if you get caught, just laugh and pretend there's nothing.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000404
text: You've seen Gargoyle Sculpture at the gathering place right?{nl}That's the Gargoyle.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000405
text: Strangely, whenever I tried to enter the fortress, it suddenly moves and blocks the way.{nl}Without making a mess, it will be impossible to suppress them with our force.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000406
text: Poata at the east forest of Siauliai are threatening the villagers.{nl}If you could eliminate them in the name of the goddesses, I will teach you my magic.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000407
text: When I saw you for the first time, you looked too awkward.. but.{nl}Now, you became more famous than me.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000408
text: Well done.{nl}When you gain some experiences and learn swordsmanship from me, you will become a good knight.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000409
text: You've come here to learn the teaching of Rogue from me?{nl}It's good.{nl}There is a task that I can verify your skills as a Rogue and resolve my problem.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000410
text: Scout Master and I used to be very good friends, but our relationship is somewhat awkward now.{nl}I want to restore the relationship by giving him a gift, but if I go, I am going to get spotted.{nl}Can you go there secretly and leave him a gift?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000411
text: Good. But this also includes your test.{nl}Give him a gift, but you have to put it secretly so Scout Master doesn't notice you.{nl}To give you an advice, you do it from his back.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000412
text: So you've come.{nl}He will be surprised when he checks it later.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000413
text: It is now time to complete my work with you.{nl}I can see that you are more than average since you were able to put it secretly without Scout Master noticing it. You will learn fast.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000414
text: So you've come here to learn the skills of Fletcher.{nl}Remember, it would also cost you a lot.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000415
text: I've been looking for the arrows that were created by the first Fletcher Master from long time ago.{nl}Those arrows were to be given to Lydia Schaffen so I am sure the expertise that was put into those arrows are not normal.{nl}I've found the whereabouts of those arrows recently so someone who would be able to recognize the true value of those arrows should go there.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000416
text: According to the information I've obtained, it looks like I would be able to find it from 36_1 of the valley region.{nl}It was used to hunt for some violent monster so you better be careful.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000417
text: I can tell it's great by just looking at its appearances.{nl}I want to research on this arrow immediately, but my promise with you come first.{nl}I will show you my skill so pay attention.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000418
text: As a Falconer Master, I am looking for the ways to make Falconers stronger with diverse methods.{nl}One of the ideas that came to me was to use the aerial monsters instead of eagles.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000419
text: Of course, I am satisfied with my partner, Rith, but I think these tries would help Falconer.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000420
text: Like when you are taming an eagle, how about feed it?{nl}I don't have high expectations so you better go there and try it first.{nl}I've put enough food so at least try on three different kinds of monsters.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000421
text: Did we fail. It's so bad, but I've expected it.{nl}Regardless of the outcomes, I will pay for your efforts.{nl}Good. I will teach you myself.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000422
text: You want to learn more advanced skills?{nl}If you want to learn advanced skills of Schwaze Reiter, your should possess competent skills.{nl}The most important thing is to shoot enemies accurately.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000423
text: I like your confidence.{nl}But, I should check whether youa re really competent enough.{nl}I will acknowledge you if you succeed landing hits on enemies 200 times consecutively without any mistake.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000424
text: So you were not a bluff.{nl}I would be pleasant to teach you if your skills are like those.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000425
text: You've come here to learn the skills of Monk?{nl}That's good. I can trust you.{nl}There's something I need to request to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000426
text: I still regret for what I did in the past.{nl}I am helping some peolpe as a result, but if it becomes known to other people, I will be in a trouble.{nl}You have to send them a gift, if you do it well, I will teach you some skills.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000427
text: There are lots of people who blame me.{nl}But, I am not doing this task for those people.{nl}I am just taking my responsibility for my mistake.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000428
text: Have you passed it well?{nl}Then, you just have to learn from me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000429
text: You've come here to get acknowledged by me?{nl}But, I have some matter to take care of now so it's little hard at the moment.{nl}The book of transactions has been ripped off due to the monsters.{nl}{nl}Because of this, I can't concentrate on other works.{nl}If you are in a hurry, then I will tell you the location so please get me the preliminary book.{nl}This is a secret, but I am telling you because of our relationship and I trust you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000430
text: The preliminary book is at 35_3 at the monastery.{nl}In order to prevent other people from finding it, I've hid it inside a book and there are some fake books as well so find it well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000431
text: You've found it well.{nl}Now, since we've taken care of urgent matter, I will acknowledge you with this.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000432
text: In order to control the abilities of Druid well, you should know well about the plants you control.{nl}I am actually researching on the occurence which the over grown plants turned into monsters so you may learn something from it.{nl}If you help me with this, I will acknowledge it as your training.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000433
text: Defeat the plants that turned into monsters and obtain some samples from them.{nl}You will be able to obtain more samples as the monsters get stronger.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000434
text: It seems that you are competent enough.{nl}As I promised to you, I will help you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000435
text: It seems that you have some business with me, but there is more important thing to do at the moment.{nl}The demonic power which was created from a far place is becoming stronger and begins to influence the power of Oracle.{nl}As a result, what we see through Clairvoyance is getting vague.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000436
text: We have to get rid of that demonic energy first.{nl}Why don't you try it first?{nl}Maybe, resolving this issue would verify your competence and can also be a test for you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000437
text: The problem is occuring at Canyon Region 36_1.{nl}You just have to put the Romuva of Purification where the demonic energy is strong.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000438
text: It seems that you've done well.{nl}It was a good decision for me to give the task to you.{nl}Okay then, I will help you from now on.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000439
text: Good. Take this object and go to Mochia Forest.{nl}When you find someone, talk naturally and you have to tell him the passwords.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000440
text: Demon Svitrigaila

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000441
text: Finally... You have come.{nl}Someone else besides miss Giltine...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000442
text: I have a request to you.{nl}Lead me to a death.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000443
text: Writings on the Pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000444
text: [Cleros' background]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000445
text: {nl}Cleros was born the eldest son to a noble family, but saw his succession rights stolen by his stepmother's children, who expelled him from their land. This can be said to be his first recorded misfortune.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000446
text: {nl}He left to find work near the border under an acquaintance's suggestion. The job turned out to be a scam; he was imprisoned and forced to work to exhaustion.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000447
text: {nl}With the help of Ruklys, he escaped his life of near-slavery, after which he took up martial arts and lived a period of peace. Ruklys was persecuted, however, and soon Cleros was back to misery.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000448
text: [The death of Cleros]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000449
text: {nl}{nl}After a long string of misfortunes living as a runaway with no achievements to be told of, he was finally arrested and taken to Kalejimas.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000450
text: {nl}I wish I could say there was hope for him at that infamous prison, but his life there was nothing but hardship until the end.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000451
text: [After the death of Cleros]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000452
text: {nl}{nl}One may think, while his life may have been plagued with misfortune, it certainly wasn't particularly arduous. But, according to what is said, even in death his spirit is being tormented by demons, unable to escape his sad situation.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000453
text: {nl}Some believe the fact that he is still suffering at the hands of the demons means there must be a secret about his life we don't know of.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000454
text: Writings on the Pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000455
text: [Rumpelstiltskin and the Moon]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000456
text: {nl}{nl}This may not be absolutely true, but this is a story that's been told by legends. What we know is that Rumpelstiltskin made a bet with Lydia Schaffen and rode her arrow headed to the moon for ages and ages.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000457
text: {nl}His trip to the moon took a very long time and was very difficult. But when he finally reached the moon, Rumpelstiltskin realized his problem. The arrow he had been riding to the moon could hardly be called an arrow anymore, given its state after the trip.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000458
text: He was surprised by the fact that the arrow he had been riding (he was only sitting on it, it was flying with his own magic) was suddenly completely worn out.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000459
text: [Rumpelstiltskin and Lydia Schaffen's Arrow]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000460
text: {nl}{nl}Of course the arrow could have become worn out over such a long trip, but instead it happened all of a sudden after Rumpelstiltskin landed on the moon, which seemed very odd.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000461
text: {nl}It turns out what happened to the arrow was Rumpelstiltskin's fault. His magic did fly the arrow to the moon and kept it protected, but what he didn't know was that Lydia Schaffen's arrow was made of a material used against demons. And so, while his magic kept the arrow unscathed all the way to the moon, upon letting go of the arrow, which was being held together solely by magic, it immediately crumbled into a lump of rust and fell to the ground.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000462
text: [Rumpelstiltskin's Whereabouts]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000463
text: {nl}{nl}Rumpelstiltskin thought long and hard and finally figured it out, but it was too late. Of course no human, goddess or demon can confirmed this story, as it exists only in legends. As far as we know, Rumpelstiltskin may as well still be on his way to the moon.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000464
text: {nl}Or, he could be wandering about in our world, looking for any other arrows Lydia Schaffen might have left behind.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000465
text: Leopoldas

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000466
text: A Revelator!{nl}It's nice to meet you. My name is Leopoldas, I manage the new members of the Kedorlaomer Merchants. I'm really glad to meet you here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000467
text: {nl}Since we've been introduced, shall we... maybe have a chat?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000468
text: Our merchants?{nl}Since you are interested, shall I tell you?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000469
text: {nl}To tell you the truth, the world needs our merchants.{nl}Not sure if you know,{nl}but we kept the Crystal Mine alive by buying minerals off it,{nl}we supplied materials to build the Astral Tower, the Great Cathedral, the Earth Tower and so much more.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000470
text: {nl}That's right. We're the ones who did all of that.{nl}Surprised?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000471
text: It'd be great if you could give our merchants a hand here in Manahas, if you have the time.{nl}Over there are our newcomers, and if you go South you can help out Jurathena Margellius.{nl}You'll be proud to call yourself an assistant to the Kedorlaomer Merchants!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000472
text: Even in our group, though, we did have our rough times.{nl}It's actually a bit rough right now.{nl}That's why we're focusing on this here right now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000473
text: See ya next time.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000474
text: Ah, I think I know what sacred object is there.{nl}Instead of using a tool, first dig it with your hand.{nl}And be careful not to break the object and bring it to me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000475
text: It shouldn't be that hard.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000476
text: Be careful not to break it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000477
text: This is the bottle which contains the secret ink which was used to write important recordings or documents.{nl}It's used to hide records and the like.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000478
text: Antanas

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000479
text: Greetings.{nl}I'm Antanas, from the Rud Order.{nl}In this day and age with the goddesses gone, instead of fighting other orders, we at the Rud Order prefer to quietly wait for the goddesses while we do our work.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000480
text: {nl}We're building a sanctuary here.{nl}We need to look for materials for it, but we seem to be rather short of hands.{nl}Would you help?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000481
text: I'm here building the sanctuary, but there are others out there gathering materials to make scriptures, looking for records of ancient sages of the Rud Order or doing other tasks.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000482
text: There's two things we need.{nl}Listen closely. {nl}Get some lime powder from monsters, and then some flat stones for construction.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000483
text: {nl}You'll be busy.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000484
text: Good luck!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000485
text: Wow, you did great.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000486
text: That.. is that from the monsters of the Fortress of the Land?{nl}Ruklys army used to have it in the past.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000487
text: The object that you've brought will aid us in our research.{nl}Can you get us some more?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000488
text: I didn't expect the monsters at the Fortress of the Land have this..{nl}This is very interesting.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000489
text: This is enough. {nl}Thank you for helping our research.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000490
text: What's up?{nl}Are you giving this to me?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000491
text: This is surprising. It's telling all about the lives of past soldiers.{nl}I should send this to the headquarters. Thank you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000492
text: No!{nl}Please don't take it away from me..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000493
text: That's a bomb.. Is that a blind shell?{nl}Can I take a look at it?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000494
text: This is very old!{nl}These kind of bombs can only be seen in the books.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000495
text: Soldier Spirit

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000496
text: I wasn't able to send an order to retreat.{nl}I should have blown the horn...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000497
text: If they don't retreat we're going to be annihilated.{nl}The horn...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000498
text: Thank you. Where do you belong to?{nl}I should get back to Ruklys now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000499
text: Wait! Listen to what he is saying.{nl}He's saying if I want to get our family treasure back, I should give him the blessed crystal.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000500
text: He has given us fake crystals at first and took away one's life.{nl}And he is asking to call a dead person and ask him.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000501
text: So I asked him how I can call it out and he told me to use the scroll for the dead to him.{nl}So I asked him how much it would cost and he answered that I can pay him by giving him some Blue Paint.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000502
text: I'm sure this man will attempt to run away whilst I'm searching for Blue Paint!{nl}Can you help me?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000503
text: Sorry. I guess I was too upset. I will tell you slowly. {nl}I'm a friend of Squire Master, Justina Legwyn.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000504
text: The dead person which the Pardoner is talking about is the father of my friend, Gailus Legwyn.{nl}It is ridiculous that missing Gailus Legwyn has passed away, and look at his attitude.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000505
text: That old man only wants to satisfy his greed.{nl}Poor Justina...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000506
text: You can find Blue Paint from the monsters at Apgaudin Crossroads.{nl}I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000507
text: Does she know the value of the Dead Scroll?{nl}Whatever... I don't care anymore.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000508
text: I'm experiencing this shame because of him. I can't stand it anymore.{nl}Find Gailus Legwyn with this and ask him yourself!{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000509
text: Look for the seal of Mires Grave{nl}I hear he died near there.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000510
text: He doesn't want to back off until he receives the blessed crystal back.{nl}He is so tenacious.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000511
text: Oh my, goddess!{nl}I didn't expect that I would meet a human here..{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000512
text: Please help me.{nl}I'm being chased by the chasers and the demons from the tower of the stars.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000513
text: Can you stand by me until I notify my other colleagues using a signal flare?{nl}I have to let the other two colleagues who came here know that I am still alive.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000514
text: Chasers came here..{nl}I might have been in danger if it wasn't for you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000515
text: You.. It's like as if the goddesses are beside you.{nl}Okay. I am sure you are better than that Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000516
text: I am the Demon Lord Hauberk.{nl}Maybe you've already met me and my other piece.{nl}But, that piece is a different piece. I don't know who you are..{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000517
text: I was running away from the demons through a human called Agatas.{nl}But, Agatas is dying due to the paralysis needle of the demon.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000518
text: I know that you don't trust me.{nl}But, please save this pilgrim.{nl}If you can find some Dark Blue Herbs, you can save him.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000519
text: (Seems to be unconscious)

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000520
text: You can save Agatas with this.{nl}There's nothing I can pay for your kindness.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000521
text: I just look like a demon that should be eliminated in your eyes right?{nl}But, when Agatas wakes up, he will explain everything to you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000522
text: The Knights of Kaliss? Good. {nl}We can't completely trust you just yet but, if you help me with the plan, I can take you with me.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000523
text: You know the Fortress of the Land was Ruklys' last battlefield, right?{nl}It was excavated from the ground like a tunnel.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000524
text: The Royal Army are all over it now, protecting it.{nl}Isn't it weird?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000525
text: The revolt occurred 400 years ago and we don't have enough workforce due to Medzio Diena.{nl}This city too.. I know that it's historically meaningful, but I am not sure if we have to protect it that much.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000526
text: Maybe some black deals were going back and forth behind the kingdom.{nl}If that's not it, why are they protecting this?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000527
text: They must be wondering what's going on since the Knights of Kaliss are here.{nl}They said they'd turn a blind eye on me if only I bring them what they want.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000528
text: So, of course I'm getting inside the fortress room that's full of treasures without the army knowing.{nl}I imagine it's loaded with riches, sinceit's the army's funds.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000529
text: First, gather the records from Ruklys' era in the assembly area.{nl}We need them to get pass the guarding Gargoyle.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000530
text: Bokor Juta

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000531
text: I'm looking for Goddess Zemyna.{nl}Everyone knows the goddess is missing.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000532
text: I've come here after hearing that the goddesses blessed the Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl}I can only see the deads.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000533
text: If you are going to stay in this chamber, can you help me?{nl}I can't do anything with my power and they come at me whenever they hear my prayers.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000534
text: I should pray to the goddesses to check whether she is around here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000535
text: Really? Thank you for your words.{nl}Prayers were hard to do alone.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000536
text: Then I am counting on you for the deads at the casket room.{nl}I will pray to the goddess in the meantime.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000537
text: I thought I would be able to find the whereabouts of Goddess Zemyna here, but this place is full of the dead..{nl}I've never seen this. We should look for Zemyna fast.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000538
text: Ah, so you've returned. {nl}Because of you, the deads didn't attack me while I was praying.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000539
text: But, even here, the prayer didn't reach the goddess.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000663
text: Feeding the aerial monsters

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000664
text: Falconer Master wants to test whether monsters can be used instead of eagles. Feed three kinds of aerial type monsters and try taming them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000665
text: Report to Falconer Master

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000666
text: You've failed to tame monsters. Go back to Falconer Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000667
text: Go meet Schwarzer Reiter Master at the Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000668
text: Shoot normal monsters 200 times consecutively

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000669
text: Schwarzer Reiter Master told you that he will see your skills to shoot enemies accurately. Hit normal monsters 200 times accurately.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000670
text: You've landed all attacks on enemies without any mistask. Go back to Schwarzer Reiter Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000671
text: Find the hidden contact and hand over the object

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000672
text: Monk Master asked you to meet the person who Vail has sent and hand over the object to him which Monk Master has given you. The person you should meet is hidden so go to the place indicated on the memo which Monk Master gave to you and say the passwords. When a person appears after hearing the passwords, give him the object.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000673
text: Report to Monk Master

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000674
text: You've successfully handed over the object to the person. Go back to Monk Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000675
text: Search the book of Pardoner Master

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000676
text: Pardoner Master told you that his book is ripped off so it can't be used. Go find the premiminary book which Pardoner Master has hidden at 35_3 of the monastery.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000677
text: You've found the book of Pardoner Master. Go back to Pardoner Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000678
text: Collect the samples of Plant-type monsters

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000679
text: Druid Master is researching on the over grown plants after Medzio Diena. To help him the research, defeat Plant-type monsters and collect the samples. You can get more samples as the monsters become stronger.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000680
text: Hand them over to Druid Master

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000681
text: You've collected enough Plant-type monsters' samples. Go back to Druid Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000682
text: Set Romuva of Purification at 36_1 of Canyon Region

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000683
text: Oracle Master told you that the demonic energy is becoming stronger lately so his abilities are being disturbed. Set Romuva of Purification on 36_1 of Canyon Region where the demonic energy is strong so there's lots of distubances.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000684
text: Report to Oracle Master

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000685
text: You've set up all Romuvas of Purification. Return to the Oracle Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000686
text: Open the treasure chest

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000687
text: Defeat the monsters by avoiding the Petrifying Frost

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000688
text: As you opened the box, faint Petrifying Frost came out and the monsters around are rushing in! Avoid the Petrifying Frost and defeat all monsters.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000689
text: Look at the pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000690
text: As you entered Galeed Plateau, you see a lot of pillars. There is one pillar that looks special, so go take a look at it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000691
text: Protect the pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000692
text: The monsters are coming to attack the pillar! Protect it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000693
text: Brush off the powders off from the pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000694
text: Does this black dust look like food to the monsters? Is that why they came running? Mow that they're gone we should dust off the rest of the pillar.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000695
text: There should be more pillars with records around here. Have a look at the others. We could use the light from the sea sparkles to read the writings on the pillars.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000696
text: Collect Monster Oil

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000697
text: To make the sea sparkles shine during the day, you need some monster oil. Hunt monsters to collect it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000698
text: Read the writings on the pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000699
text: You have collected the monster oil. Take it to the pillar and use the light from the sea sparkles to read the writings on it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000700
text: Defeat monsters to obtain Monster Oil

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000701
text: It seems that someone's records are present on other pillars. Look at the pillars.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000702
text: Speak out the numbers

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000703
text: The instructions seem to say that, if you speak out the numbers obtained at the Galeed Plateau, the writings on the pillar will become visible. Stand near the pillar and enter the numbers into the chat window.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000704
text: The writings on the pillar are beginning to appear! Read them!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000705
text: A pillar has appeared! Go have a look at it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000706
text: Repair the pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000707
text: You seem to need shining moss to read the writings on the summoning pillar. Go and gather some. Note that, if you don't come back within 5 minutes, you'll have to wait until it appears again, so hurry.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000708
text: Read the writings on the pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000709
text: You should be able to read the pillar now. Go near it and have a look.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000710
text: It seems that there is another record on the other pillar which continues from this story. Look at the pillar closely.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000711
text: Obtain Sticky Liquid

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000712
text: The pillar collapsed without even being touched.{nl}Collect some viscous liquid from monsters to repair the pillar.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000713
text: Repair the pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000714
text: You have collected the sticky liquid. Go back and repair the pillar.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000715
text: Defeat monsters and collect %s

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000716
text: Obtain the sticky liquid

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000717
text: The rest of the story seems to be written on the pillar. Go there and take a close look at it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000718
text: Put the pieces into the pillars

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000719
text: It seems that the pieces would fit well. Try putting them in. But, if you give up on a quest, the piece will disappear. When you go to the pillars when the pieces disappear, you will be able to obtain the pieces.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000720
text: It seems that the pieces would fit well. Try putting them in.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000721
text: Continue the talk with Jurate about the sacred object.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000722
text: Excavate the sacred object

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000723
text: Excavate the sacred object secretly by going to the place where you found with the detector stick.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000724
text: Report to Jurate

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000725
text: It seems that you've found a sacred object. Take it to Jurate.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000726
text: Wilhelmina Carriot is looking at what you have closely. Talk with Wilhelmina Carriot.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000727
text: Obtain Ruklys' Army Seals and Parchments

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000728
text: Wilhelmina Carriot wants more documents. Obtain some things that can be used as information from the Fortress of the Land.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000729
text: Hand them over to Wilhelmina Carriot

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000730
text: Wilhelmina Carriot will be satisfied with this. Hand them over to Wilhelmina Carriot.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000731
text: Talk with the Ruklys Army Soldier's Spirit

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000732
text: Talk with the Ruklys Army Soldier's Spirit

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000733
text: Pass the retreat order to the spirits by blowing the horn

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000734
text: Blow the horn and pass the retreat order to the Ruklys Army Soldier's Spirits.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000735
text: Talk with Priest Irma

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000736
text: Priest Irma is waiting for help in Ashaq Underground Prison 3F.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000737
text: The Demon Lord Marnox attacked when you entered the hideout!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000738
text: You've defeated the Demon Lord Marnox. Talk with Priest Irma.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000739
text: Defeat Demon Lord Marnox

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000740
text: You have collected the stones!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151001_000741
text: You obtained nothing

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000742
text: So you are the famous Revelator, right?{nl}Hmm... I have something to suggest to you. Why don't you work with me?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000743
text: You know that Fortress of the Land was the last place where the Ruklys' army resisted, right?{nl}But, not only that. What I am going to tell you from now on is a secret... I have a question before that.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000744
text: Whose side are you on?{nl}The Royal Army or the Knights of Kaliss?{nl}If you don't want to answer, then just do what you are told.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000745
text: [The Life of Cleros]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000746
text: {nl}Cleros is the elder son of some landlord.{nl}He lost the right of succession to the child of stepmother and was expelled out of the land.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000747
text: His life which is full of failures started like that.{nl}He began to look for another job as a result of his friend's advice.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000748
text: But, that was the plan to sell Cleros.{nl}He became a slave that has to work till the death while being locked inside.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000749
text: While he was locked inside, he received the salvation of Ruklys.{nl}His life as a slave was now over, but the peaceful days weren't going to last long.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000750
text: When Ruklys was defeated, his rest turned into a disaster.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000751
text: {nl}A long escape continued.{nl}He didn't succeed in anything in his life.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000752
text: And he was caught and locked inside Kalejimas.{nl}It would've been good if there was any hope in that prison..{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000753
text: But, he experienced agony there and died.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000754
text: {nl}If the story ends here, this will be the story of some person who failed his life.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000755
text: But, according to some info, he is still being tortured by the demon.{nl}His spirit.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000756
text: As a result, there are people who say there's some hidden story behind his life.{nl}But, no one knows what the story is.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000757
text: {nl}{nl}Look for the small dot which goes after the night sky.{nl}That's Rumpelstiltskin flying towards the moon.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000758
text: As we know, Rumpelstiltskin made a bet with Lydia Schaffen and flew to the moon.{nl}It took him ages and ages.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000759
text: About halfway there, Rumpelstiltskin was suddenly surprised beyond belief.{nl}The arrow he had been riding was almost completely destroyed.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000760
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin realized he had been tricked.{nl}Of course, the arrow could have disintegrated from flying for so long.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000761
text: However, it was Rumpelstiltskin's own magic that was at fault.{nl}You see, Lydia Schaffen's arrow had been made to possess power against demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000762
text: That's right. Rumpelstiltskin was a demon.{nl}So when his power and the power of the arrow collided, it started to disintegrate.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000763
text: Rumpelstiltskin, who has just realized that, was furious, but it was to no use.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000764
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin, unable to return to earth, is still flying towards the moon.{nl}Or, he could just as well be back already, searching for more of Lydia's arrows.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000765
text: This story can't be verified by humans, goddesses, nor demons.{nl}Of course, it would become apparent if we would be able to go to the moon.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000766
text: What, aren't you the Revelator?{nl}It's so good to see you.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000767
text: Of course, I know about you.{nl}We of the Kedora Merchant Alliance know everything.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000768
text: We're a distinguished alliance; we worked on the Astral Tower, the Great Cathedral and other major constructions.{nl}Will of the goddesses. I'd say we were a sort of driving force in history.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000769
text: Oh, I'm in charge of the new members by the way.{nl}After Medzio Diena we had to use even the newcomers to help with reconstruction.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000770
text: How about we help each other out?{nl}He is the helper of our Kedora Merchant Alliance.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000771
text: Thank you so much.{nl}The newcomers are beside me.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000772
text: I was going to be a little strict teaching you, but that's not really me.{nl}I was wondering if you could give us a hand.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000773
text: If you go south you can help out Jurathena Margellius.{nl}The monsters around here are tough even for a veteran.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000774
text: Even in our group, though, we did have our rough times.{nl}It's actually a bit rough right now.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000775
text: That's why we're focused here on Manahas right now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000776
text: Alright, go then.{nl}It shouldn't be too hard for someone of your fame.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000777
text: Greetings.{nl}I'm Antanas, from Nestospa. {nl}Have you ever seen Nestospa?{nl}Well, it doesn't matter if you haven't.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000778
text: {nl}The people of Nestospa here are just quietly doing their work.{nl}Myself, I'm here making tombstones.{nl}The problem is I have no materials.{nl}Would you help me?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000779
text: Antanas told you to go?{nl}I'm Giedra, from Nestospa.{nl}If you already met Antanas, you probably know what we do by now, so I'll keep it short.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000780
text: {nl}I'm gathering materials to make scriptures of the goddesses.{nl}Regular paper gets yellow and falls apart too quickly... so I'm looking for a material that won't get wet or change color. {nl}Transparent monster shells are perfect for this, since they last a long time after they're carved.{nl}Will you gather some for me?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000781
text: You're back faster than I thought.{nl}I'll use these shells to make the scriptures.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000782
text: Oh, my sign... Without it there's no telling if I'm Nestospa or Anastospa...{nl}I lost everything... The monsters took everything...{nl}I'm done...{nl}I was going to Fasika Plateau after my pilgrimage but...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000783
text: Oooohh!{nl}Please help me!{nl}My Nestospa sign is gone!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000784
text: {nl}It's gone, gone, gone!{nl}Please help me find it!{nl}The monsters must have taken it!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000785
text: How could this happen...{nl}I'm  done... How am I going to face my Nestospa mentors...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000786
text: That's it!{nl}Wow, you found them all!{nl}Thank you!{nl}How can I ever repay you...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000787
text: It is very surprising. What soldiers did in the past is written here. {nl}I am going to pass this document to the headquarters. {nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000788
text: I will give you a copy of the book as a token of my appreciation.{nl}It is written roughly, but our objective is to find out the truth in the past.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000789
text: Ruklys Army Soldier's Spirit

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000790
text: If we don't make an order to retreat, they will all be annihilated.{nl}Please blow the horn..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000791
text: The Knights of Kaliss? Good. {nl}The Fortress of the Land can't be entered since there are too many Royal Army guards.{nl}But, if you help me with the plan, I can take you with me.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000792
text: About the secret I told you a while ago...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000793
text: I heard some saying that the Fortress of the Land is to protect the treasure which was received from Ruklys.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000794
text: Think about it. Isn't it strange?{nl}The Royal Army guards are protecting the hole which is digged like a ant hole.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000795
text: The Knights of Kaliss wants to know if something is there.{nl}They told us that if we investigate the Fortress of the Land, they won't say anything regardless of what we do.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000796
text: Ah, of course, I am going to go look for the treasure of Ruklys.{nl}The treasure is from the goddesses so it must be something amazing.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000797
text: Anyways, you are going to be with me right?{nl}Please first gather the records from Ruklys Era at the gathering place.{nl}In order to break Gargoyle, we need that.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000798
text: Hey, you.{nl}What are you doing here in this far off forest?{nl}Well, it doesn't matter. Whoever you are, can you give me a hand?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000799
text: My name is Druid Leja and I live in this forest.{nl}I've reached here by chasing after the ferrets that ran away with the food from the village.{nl}I wasn't able to find the food, but instead was attacked by ferrets.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000800
text: I want to cure my wound before I go back to the village..{nl}When we go up there, there is a herb that works well on wounds. Please bring us those herbs.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000801
text: When we collect the herbs, the ferrets may attack us.{nl}They think everything in this forest belongs to them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000802
text: Revelator, have you drank the red water before?{nl}If you had drank it before, I am sure you won't be able to talk to me now.{nl}Even if you are really thirsty, you shouldn't drink the red water. If you drink it, you will suffer from it.{nl}It is so toxic. The fruits that grew by consuming the water got huge and can't be edible.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000803
text: I was once lost in a forest and I was really thirsty at then.{nl}I found a container with fruit juice in it which the ferrets had accumulated.{nl}Dying from thirst or dying from the ferrets, dying is the same.{nl}So I drank the juice without the ferrets knowing and nothing happened to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000804
text: We're almost running out of the water we had collected, we need to find more.{nl}Could you get some fruit juice from the ferrets? Thank you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000805
text: The taste of the fruit juice was way better than I expected...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000806
text: Wow, thanks. We wouldn't have to worry about the drinkable water with this much amount.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000807
text: Ah.. I didn't expect I would see a human here..! Please help me!{nl}I am called Druid Benes. I am trying to find the reason why the ferrets are coopering with the demons.{nl}Recently, I found out that I will be able to talk to the ferrets using the spell of the Druids.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000808
text: The problem is, since I've been around them for so long, they already know my smell.{nl}Even when I turn into a ferret, they recognize me and refuse to talk to me.{nl}Would you turn into a ferret for me and try and find out what they're plotting?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000809
text: In order to turn into a Ferret, you should observe the behaviors of ferrets well.{nl}If we do something awkward, we will get discovered by ferrets.{nl}I am going to give you an empty scroll so please observe the behaviors of ferrets and record them here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000810
text: From what you observed, I am going to make a Ferret Transformation Scroll.{nl}So please write in details as much as possible. So that even if it transforms, it doesn't look awkward.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000811
text: You've observed in details.{nl}You won't have a problem if you transform now.{nl}Please wait.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000812
text: Someone's Record

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000813
text: Something Carved on the Pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000814
text: The crystal emanating the mysterious light is not fully repleted!{nl}Defeat nearby monsters to collect monster oil and make the crystal shine its light!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000815
text: The crystal emanating the mysterious ray begins to shine brightly!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000816
text: 3 numbers are the secret of the pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000817
text: Carvings on the Pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000818
text: What is the written on the pillar?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000819
text: The pillar collapsed!{nl}Collect sticky liquid from monsters to repair it!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000820
text: You have obtained sticky fluid!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000821
text: Repairing the pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000822
text: Look for the pieces of the pillar

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000823
text: Please tell me what it is

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000824
text: I will ask later

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000825
text: I will go

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000826
text: I have something to do

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000827
text: Please wait

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000828
text: I will go meet

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000829
text: I will come back soon

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000830
text: Lighting it up

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000831
text: I will take a look around

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000832
text: I don't need that

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000833
text: It will come if you wait

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000834
text: It is likely that there are more pillars with someone's records. Look at the pillar. You would be able to read the writings on the pillar even if it's dark if you have the crystals that illuminates a mysterious ray.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000835
text: The crystal emanating the mysterious light requires monster oil to shine. Hunt monsters and collect monster oil.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000836
text: You have obtained the monster oil. Go back to the pillar with the crystal and use its light to see the writings on it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000837
text: The instructions seem to day that, if you speak out the numbers obtained at the Galeed Plateau, the writings on the pillar will become visible. Stand near the pillar and enter the numbers into the chat window. Obtain hints from colored pillars.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000838
text: Obtain %s from monsters

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000839
text: The books from the Ruklys Era are scattered around. Look for the books that are readable.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000840
text: If you bring these books to Wilhelmina Carriot, you would be able to receive some rewars.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000841
text: You can see the Ruklys Army Soldier's Spirit that can't go back beside the goddess. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000842
text: It seems that he regrets that he couldn't blow the horn to order for retreat. Blow the horn and let other spirits know about the spirit.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000843
text: You blew the horn and sent out the retreat order. Tell the Ruklys Army Soldier's Spirit about it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000844
text: Talk with Settler Browein

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000845
text: Talk with Settler Browein at Lemprasa Pond

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000846
text: Talk with Settler Brophen

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000847
text: Talk with Settler Brophen

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000848
text: Use a Status Point

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000849

text: Settler Ivanayus wants you to collect useful objects that can be used by settlers that are left by natives.

text: Talk with Settler Dallanas
