text: Talk with Settler Dallanas

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000880
text: Worship the Statue of Goddess Zemyna

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000881
text: Settler Dallanas would like to bless your explorations and as asked you to worship the statue of Goddess Zemyna to receive her grace.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000882
text: Bring the Settlers

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151016_000883
text: Settler Dallanas has asked you to bring the settlers that were spreaded across the area.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000884
text: Can you hand over the records to Wilhelmina?{nl}She told me that she will help us break Gargoyle so don't forget to get something from her when you return.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000885
text: Mardas

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000886
text: Ah... a human in this place...{nl}There are demons here. You better run away.{nl}A while ago, demons appeared from up there and are controlling the monsters.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000887
text: Are you insane?{nl}I don't know how strong you are, but I will stay here so if you want to go, please go alone.{nl}The place where I saw demons was the place where the owl sculpture is located..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000888
text: I've been chased by demons and ran here from the castle.{nl}I don't want to experience any more troubles.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000889
text: No demons were there and only other monsters?{nl}That's fortunate I guess.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000890
text: You're stronger than you look.{nl}I wasn't expecting that.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000891
text: Please come back to me when you fix the detector.{nl}I have something to tell you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000892
text: I am going to guide each and every one of you with sincerity.{nl}I hope the road ahead of you is full of blessings.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000893
text: It doesn't matter anymore.{nl}I just want to take a break...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000894
text: [Ordeal of Cleros]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000895
text: The sun of gold ray, the moon of silver ray and the land of bronze ray.{nl}What is your number.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000896
text: It seems you don't know anything about our merchants.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000897
text: Hmm, have you ever seen the Great Cathedral or Mage Tower before?{nl}Or something like the gigantic Goddess Statue of Fedimian?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000898
text: Do you think a large construction like that can be completed by one individual?{nl}Of course not. It's hard to supply such materials even if the kingdom comes first.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000899
text: We are the merchants that supplied materials to the historic construction.{nl}Do you understand now?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000900
text: We helped for the completion of it.{nl}The objective of our merchants is the will of the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000901
text: Ah, I am in charge of newcomers of Kedora Merchant Alliance.{nl}We've received severe damages on Medzio Diena so even the newcomers are trying their best to restore the place.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000902
text: We are in a trouble.{nl}We have to put up a notice board, but we're just too busy.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000903
text: The Kedora Merchant Alliance act harsh on newcomers.{nl}Especially Leopoldas, he's really scary... He wants me to do this alone.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000904
text: If that's so, can you place this notice board on Kluibe Road?{nl}Edita, our leader, is excavating this sacred object.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000905
text: I am counting on you to do this secretly without being detected by Leopoldas.{nl}I have to go somewhere.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000906
text: I am counting on you to do this secretly without being detected by Leopoldas.{nl}For sure.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000907
text: I am helping the Revelators who have just started their journeys from the Kedora Merchant Alliance.{nl}If you don't mind, can you help us?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000908
text: It's not that difficult.{nl}You just have to pass the blessing which is needed for their journeys.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000909
text: Thank you.{nl}Then, I will tell you how you can do it.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000910
text: Please look for the Revelators who have started their journeys around Orsha or Klaipeda.{nl}When you use this scroll on them, they will receive a helpful blessing for their journeys.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000911
text: Ah, it won't be effective to ones who have already been blessed, so please keep that in mind.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000912
text: We can't just rely on the goddess.{nl}We should do it ourselves in order to reduce the burden on the goddesses.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000913
text: We, Kedora Merchant Alliance helped the goddesses secretly until now.{nl}But, since the world turned into a chaos, we are going to help her actively.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000914
text: We are in trouble...{nl}There are so many things to retrieve, but I don't know what people are doing.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000915
text: Ah, so Leopoldas sent you here?{nl}Finally, it seems he has stopped being so stubborn.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000916
text: A long time ago, I was sending the sacred objects to Fedimian.{nl}But, I didn't realise it was on Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000917
text: It was such a mess.{nl}They took care of urgent matters in other regions and they now came out to retrieve the sacred objects.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000918
text: Okay, let's stop complaining. I want you to retrieve the sacred objects from Goanar Path.{nl}I believe that they are buried deep in the ground.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000919
text: Ah, and there are many monsters around that threaten us merchants.{nl}If it's alright with you, I want you to defeat them as well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000920
text: Be careful since there are many monsters around there.{nl}If there weren't any monsters, our task would not have been completed this late.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000921
text: Leopoldas never asks anyone for help.{nl}I never knew that you were this good.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000922
text: Actually, we received a strange report.{nl}The monsters at Kluibe Road are digging only one spot.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000923
text: I think what they are looking for is one of our Merchants' object.{nl}And it would take some time until the retrieval group reaches here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000924
text: Is it the sacred object?{nl}It's been such a long time so I can't think of anything else.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000925
text: Those are the records from the merchants.{nl}They are badly torn.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000926
text: I am sure the monsters created this mess.{nl}Give it to me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000927
text: Let's see.{nl}It is about..{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000928
text: This is the book about the materials for the arrow.{nl}Long time ago, they were supplied to Lydia Schaffen and the first Fletcher Master.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000929
text: I thought it was the sacred object that was lost long ago, it's an unexpected gift.{nl}It is said that the arrow of Lydia Schaffen has some special power in it.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000930
text: It is hard to restore it myself.. {nl}I should put it somewhere in the safe place and restore it when I go back to the headquarter.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000931
text: The remaining spot should be somewhere around Juikas Field.. but, I have no idea where it is exactly.{nl}If it's alright with you, could you help me out with this?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000932
text: I will give you the detector so please see how it reacts to it.{nl}It will only react on the marks that were put on by merchants so you won't get lost.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000933
text: Isn't this really a good method?{nl}We put marks on all objects of the Merchants just in case they happened to get lost.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000934
text: Ahah, you've found the most important object!{nl}This is the mysterious ink.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000935
text: This is the secret ink which you use when you have to hide the records.{nl}It is very expensive as a result.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000936
text: You've been a great help to me so far.{nl}We will take care of the rest!{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000937
text: Leopoldas?{nl}Ah, he is our brother. What's the matter?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000938
text: He sent you to help me?{nl}I can't believe it.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000939
text: Well, anyways, it's good.{nl}That damn monster took away everything.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000940
text: Other things are fine, but the problem is the teaching materials for the newcomers.{nl}If we don't have those, we have to work from the beginning.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000941
text: You've seen the newcomers who Leopoldas manages right?{nl}These are the documents to educate those newcomers.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000942
text: Well, we, merchants support the will of the goddesses, but we moved secretly from behind.{nl}But, we can't stand anymore since the world is like this.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000943
text: That's why we've decided to hire new people and participate more actively.{nl}But, since the world is like this, we can't just do nothing.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000944
text: Anyways, if you are going to help me, please get me those documents again.{nl}If we don't have those, it would become complicated.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000945
text: It's not going to be over even if we find all those documents.{nl}Get ready since we also have to create the manuscript.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000946
text: I know the good meaning of it, but I am not sure if we are going to survive.{nl}If so, we are not doing something that we hadn't done before so it doesn't matter.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000947
text: Fighting against monsters are not something rare.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000948
text: Good. Our brother send us a good helper.{nl}Let's make the manuscript now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000949
text: I will do the writing anyways so you don't have to worry.{nl}What I need is the ink.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000950
text: If there's an ink that is made up the body fluid from the monsters, it would last long.{nl}I will give you the trap so I am counting on you for the monster body fluid.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000951
text: Put the trap on the way that monsters cross.{nl}When monsters faint out after stepping on the trap, get the body fluid.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000952
text: Ah, this is the trick that only works at Droze Empty Lot so you should only put the trap there.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000953
text: You've already obtained all of them?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000954
text: I knew it. We still need more.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000955
text: This is enough.{nl}You've done well so far.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000956
text: If we meet next time, I will treat you a lot from our merchants,.{nl}I will do the rest so go back.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000957
text: Hello.{nl}Have you ever heard of Nestospa?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000958
text: Well, it doesn't really matter even if we didn't hear anything about it.{nl}They only concentrate on their religious belief quietly.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000959
text: I am one of those Nestospa.{nl}Prayers are good, but I am making a tombstone to see if that's going to help the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000960
text: I am trying to get rid of the evil energy and send only sacred energy to the goddess.{nl}But, I am having a problem collecting materials. {nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000961
text: Can you help me?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000962
text: There are too many materials.{nl}Listen well.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000963
text: Get some lime powder from monsters, and then some flat stones for construction.{nl}You'll be busy.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000964
text: I can't just stand still even if I can't fact demons directly.{nl}Everyone does his/her own task.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000965
text: Goold. Well done.{nl}Now the materials are all collected.. We need some special tools.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000966
text: Good. Since you've helped me until now, why don't you make a tombstone yourself?{nl}Your name will be reached to the goddess with the sacred power.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000967
text: Just do your best to make a shape.{nl}How about it? Do you want to try it?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000968
text: Make it beautiful.{nl}I will do the rest so don't worry too much.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000969
text: It's quite a nice shape, composed but heavy.{nl}Leave the final touches to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000970
text: I don't know how many tombstones we are going to make..{nl}But, when you see this kind of tombstone from now on, please remember that there are people like us.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000971
text: The kingdom hasn't been collapsed by the demons yet.{nl}If we do our best, we would be able to find the peace.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000972
text: Ah, up there, We need help from Giedra near Baderam Hill.{nl}If you are okay, I want you to help me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000973
text: Do you have any business with me?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000974
text: Antanas has asked you to help me?{nl}That's good. I am compiling the scripture of the goddesses here.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000975
text: We should have something that we can rely on when we are facing diffculties like nowadays.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000976
text: The scripture helped that.{nl}We should calm us down by reading the words of the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000977
text: We should first collect the materials to compile the scripture.{nl}Normal sheets become yellow and break.. We are trying to compile it with new materials now.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000978
text: Transparent shells of monsters are good.{nl}When we engrave letters on them, they last long.{nl}Could you get me those?{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000979
text: Those are easy to find.{nl}Okay, then I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000980
text: Everyone needs something to rely one.{nl}But the goddesses.. {nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000981
text: Yes.{nl}We should be like a big tree that can be relied on.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000982
text: You've brought them sooner than I expected.{nl}This shell would become the scripture after polising it up. Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000983
text: To make the scripture, sheets are important, but binding is also important.{nl}Especially, the strings. It will be no good if the scripture gets untied.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000984
text: The string that is made up of the leather of monster is the best, but the problem is that it is short.{nl}I will give you a Moru so can you make a leather string for the binding?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000985
text: We should first obtain leather strings from monsters.{nl}After that, we will use this Moru to make a string for the binding.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000986
text: We will connect short ones to make a long string for the binding.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000987
text: I've learned the binding from Orsha long time ago.{nl}But, the task is too much with my own power.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000988
text: Ah! What should I do? what should I do..{nl}Without it, I won't know if I am a Nestos or Anastos.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000989
text: I am done. done.{nl}Since the pilgrim is over, I am trying to go to Pasaka Canyon, but I've done it again.{nl}Ahah.. I don't want to do this..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000990
text: Yes? Ah, I didn't know you were there. I am sorry.{nl}I am now. Ah.. too desperate.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000991
text: My luggage is gone.{nl}In fact what's inside are potato dumplings, books and etc, but the sign of Nestos.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000992
text: Ah.. really. The sign of Nestos is most important.{nl}That is so important to me.. I am sure the monsters have taken it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000993
text: What should I do..{nl}How would I see the faces of Nestospa..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000994
text: That's it!{nl}Wow, you've collected all of them!{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000995
text: How can I pay for this?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000996
text: I was talking gibberish right?{nl}I am so sorry. I was too desperate so I wanted to give up on everything.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000997
text: This sign is like a sacred object to us.{nl}This is the symbol that we gained lots of diverse knowledge and passed many ordeals.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000998
text: We should go back.{nl}We won't lose it again right?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_000999
text: Ah...{nl}Antanas and Giedra keeps them well, but I don't undertand why I am losing them so often.{nl}I think I possess some secret power that pulls monsters..{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001000
text: Anyways, I will go to Pasaka Canyon now where the masters are present!{nl}Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001001
text: In order to collect the sacred power, we should possess some necessary tools.{nl}As you can see, I am not a priest who has been training for a long time.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001002
text: I've ordered some special hammer and chisel. {nl}Since the due date has reached, can you get me those?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001003
text: Normal tools won't work.{nl}If they work, I wouldn't have asked for your help.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001004
text: Did Antanas send you?{nl}His orders are too difficult..{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001005
text: Other blacksmiths would have problem fulfilling his orders.{nl}Here is the hammer. Are you going to engrave the sacred spell into it?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001006
text: Chisel?{nl}I don't sell chisels so I've asked someone else to prepare for him.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001007
text: Go meet Jura.{nl}She works at the equipment shop.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001008
text: See you again later.{nl}You are going to repair your equipment here from now on right?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001009
text: Welcome!{nl}The best equipment shop in Orsha!{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001010
text: Chisel?{nl}Are you talking about the chisel which Ilanai has given to you?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001011
text: Good. Receive it.{nl}I guess your religious belief in the goddesses is strong.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001012
text: Jura has the chisel.{nl}She works at the equipment shop.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001013
text: Oh, you've made it well according to the order.{nl}Now, I guess I can get to work.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001014
text: Do you still have things to order?{nl}You can just take a look around so please visit here often.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001015
text: Have you found the chisel?{nl}I welcome orders like this so please keep visit our shop.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001016
text: What do you think?{nl}Why don't you help us if you think eliminating demons is important even if our objectives are different from each other.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001017
text: First of all, there are many polluted tombstones.{nl}I will break these so I want you to break the polluted tombstone at Usas Hill.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001018
text: I think that tombstone is also spurting out the red energies.{nl}Like the tombstone beside. That's the proof of the pollution.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001019
text: I can't understand.{nl}Albinas? Are you the member of the Anastos?{nl}That doesn't make sense?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001020
text: I'm not saying I know everyone from the Anastospa...{nl}But we used to be part of the same Order so I know them well.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001021
text: No way, bring him here at once! {nl}I'll have to hear from him myself!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001022
text: When you have enough stones, go see Eduinas at the Nestospa camp.{nl}He'll use them to make stones for construction.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001023
text: Eduinas won't be happy if he finds out you made this tombstone, though.{nl}Just keep that in mind if you want to take responsibility.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001024
text: While I am polishing up the materials, I don't want to see your face.{nl}How about defeating the monsters that make the place around here messy.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001025
text: Since everything is done, go back to Damijonas with this.{nl}Do not ever do it again.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001026
text: You've got it. Now, I will start the recovery.{nl}It is fortunate that the damage wasn't severe.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001027
text: We and the Anastospa have different opinions, but we are not hostile to each other.{nl}Ever since the unknown name came out, it's apparent that we suspect it.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001028
text: And you even broke the tombstone.{nl}Anyways, since you've done your responsibility, I will forgive you.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001029
text: Don't you feel it's unfair to just let it go?{nl}Since there's a camp of Anastospa up there, go there and ask.{nl}It's really strange.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001030
text: Yes, I am Anastos'... yes that's right.{nl}What brought you here?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001031
text: Sorry, I can't answer your questions at the moment since I am too busy at the moment..{nl}If you can find my research documents, I may get some spare time...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001032
text: Instead of blind devotion, a life of eliminating demons and preparing for chaos..{nl}I mean those kind of things.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001033
text: This is truly strange.{nl}I should send one of my colleagues to find it out.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001034
text: Ah, by the way, I am thinking about giving him a flare to prepare for any danger, but{nl}There aren't any adequate flares.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001035
text: Can you get us the powders that burn well in the fire?{nl}There are so many monsters around so it won't be hard to obtain the materials.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001036
text: Let's wait for the investigation results.{nl}He is a competant lad so he will find it out soon.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001037
text: Since we can't just stand still, how about we find it out ourselves as well?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001038
text: Good. Barte may have seen something.{nl}She recently joined our camp.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001039
text: How about you ask her about Albinas?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001040
text: Albinas?{nl}I saw someone matching your description near Majiva Grave Field.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001041
text: When you go back to Majiva Grave Field, that leather may be still there.{nl}I... even if the goddesses tell me to go, I can't since I am too scared.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001042
text: What's the matter?{nl}I can't think anyone who would use that pattern except for the servant of Baiga.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001043
text: We better let other people know this fast.{nl}You let Gedas know!{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001044
text: Please, save Fabijus!{nl}Ah, before that, we better go back to Nestospa!{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001045
text: This holy water, please take it.{nl}You will get at least one chance of using it on the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001046
text: So you were safe.{nl}I've heard about Albinas from Fabijus.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001047
text: Do you think that makes sense?{nl}You broke the well working tombstone and you are saying there is no tombstone?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001048
text: What do you want me to say?{nl}I have a headache due to the tombstone so don't talk to me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001049
text: It is so fortunate that the divine water I gave to you was helpful.{nl}It gives me goose bumps to think that the demons are within humans and alienate.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001050
text: Can you tell Damijonas about this?{nl}I think they must be protecting the broken tombstone near Usas Hill.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001051
text: I was able to protect the conspiracy of the demons because of you.{nl}I thought we may have been seperated.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001052
text: Oh. That's right.{nl}Is there anything you found out about Albinas?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001053
text: I am sure there are people who fell into their alienating.{nl}They are trying to break them from inside...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001054
text: Anyways, thank you.{nl}I hope the goddesses bless you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001055
text: Albinas has disappeared! What's going on?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001056
text: What, Are you interested in the revelation?{nl}But, there arent anything besides those writings...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001057
text: First, you bring their attention as Eminent tells you to.{nl}At the same time, let's activate the magic circle at Paramiso Battle Field in secret with me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001058
text: You guys should be punished according to kingdom orders in principle.{nl}But, since you've saved our lives and many of our collegues have failed..{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001059
text: The safety of our colleagues comes first instead of your punishment.{nl}If you could help recapture our headquarters, then I will not question why you've entered here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001060
text: I will prepare the magic with the memories of the spirits so you go to Ataka Side Road.{nl}Bring everything you can.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001061
text: I've seen the magic circles were activating. You are okay right? {nl}How about Eminent?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001062
text: The space which the tyrant who you've asked threw away is probably.. {nl}It is the prison that was made in the era of Kadumel era. {nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001063
text: Restoring the magic circle was the duty of Higgs, but we have no other way since he is injured.{nl}Also everyone is getting tired due to the coldness.. I want to lend your power.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001064
text: You are better than Higgs.{nl}Can you help us one more time?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001065
text: I met the monsters while returning with the message.{nl}I think I can move if I take little more rest, but this message should be delivered fast..{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001066
text: You seem competent as a swordsman.{nl}Do you have any plans to reach a higher stage?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001067
text: First, show me your skills.{nl}From the Woods of the Linked Bridges, come back after defeating 10 Lapflammers and 10 Lapemans.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001068
text: If you train hard, it won't be that hard.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001069
text: Good.{nl}You look competent enough to progress to the next level.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001070
text: Are you the one who wants to walk the way of Highlander?{nl}Then, you should pass the test.{nl}I don't have time to waste on someone who is not worthy enough.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001071
text: The main weapon of the Highlander are the two handed swords. They are strong, but you should possess enough power to hold the swords.{nl}Attack the practice pole near it and I will test how strong you are.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001072
text: Attack the practice pole near me.{nl}I will evaluate how strong you are.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001073
text: Hmm... It seems that you won't have a big problem.{nl}If you pass one more test, I will teach the skills of Highlander.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001074
text: Your power seems to be enough.{nl}Now, I will check how you use that power well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001075
text: With you skills, Lapflammers at Paupys Dock won't be hard.{nl}When you come back after defeating 10 of them, I will open the way of Highlander to you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001076
text: Come back after defeating Lapflammers at Paupys Dock.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001077
text: Your competence won't do any harm to Highlanders' fame.{nl}My father who is a master would say the same thing.{nl}On behalf of the master, I will teach you the skills of Highlander.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001078
text: You want to become a Peltasta? That's a wise decision.{nl}Let me ask one question to you. Do you hate the demons?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001079
text: Good. The most basic requirements have been fulfilled.{nl}We, Peltastas use the shield aggressively to face against the enemies.{nl}So you must have the basic understanding of using the shield.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001080
text: I'm going to ask you for some materials for your shield.{nl}First you collect metal decorations from Lapemans.{nl}Also, gather some dry wood from an isolated worshop there.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001081
text: The Lapeman metal decorations are used for the frame, the wood for the body.{nl}You'll find both in Paupys Crossing.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001082
text: Well done.{nl}When you obtain the manual for the shield in the future, I want you to make it yourself by collecting the materials yourself.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001083
text: Welcome to the world of Peltastas.{nl}Let's do our best until we defeat all the demons!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001084
text: It's always good to see new brothers and sisters.{nl}Can you help the villagers here with me?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001085
text: It's not good since Lapemans are keep giving the villagers pain at Linked Bridges.{nl}In fact, I want to punish them myself.{nl}But, Rosaliya... told me that I should not leave Orsha.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001086
text: On behalf of me, please correct the bad habit of Lapezards and Lapemiter.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001087
text: I am just doing my important duty which I've received from Master.{nl}I am not jealous of your journey!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001088
text: Have you completed the mission?{nl}You would be able to become a higher level Cleric.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001089
text: I welcome any brothers or sisters who would walk the way of Krivi.{nl}My name is Mellinda.{nl}I am going to give you a simple test if you are qualified to become a Krivi. Are you okay?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001090
text: Good. The test is simple.{nl}Receive this crystal jewel.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001091
text: This absorbs the monster's vitalities and possess them as the energy of the flame.{nl}Hunt for the monsters outside the city and put the energies into the jewel.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001092
text: When the jewel gets big, use the jewel to light up the torch beside me.{nl}With that, I will test to see if you would be able to use the energies of the torch well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001093
text: Defeat the monsters and fill in the energies of the jewel.{nl}And when you light up the torch with the jewel, the test will be over.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001094
text: I think you would be able to use the energy of the torch efficiently.{nl}Welcome to the way of Krivi.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001095
text: You want to walk the way of the Priest.{nl}I recognized it at once. Your competence is enough to become a Priest.{nl}It's just... to pray that your journey would be alright, we need some preparations.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001096
text: Please receive this divine water.{nl}And you just have to receive blessing from the other priests here in Orsha.{nl}Ask for the blessing to Clerik, Krivi and Bokor sub-masters.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001097
text: Ask for the blessing to Cleric, Krivi and Bokor sub-masters.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001098
text: Good. Blessing from the four priests including me would help your journey.{nl}From now on, I want you to concentrate on the roles of Priest and responsibilities.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001099
text: You want to step into a higher level?{nl}It's going to be a tough way. Are you still going to go? To look for the strength?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001100
text: Good. If that's so I would have to check whether you are ready.{nl}Defeat Yognomes at 63_3 of Bracken Forest.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001101
text: If you could defeat 30 of them, I would acknowledge your strength.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001102
text: You are not just bluffing, but you surely possess competence.{nl}On behalf of the master, I will teach you everything about the Swordsman.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001103
text: Did you get used to two handed swords?{nl}Now, I will teach you how you can use two handed swords well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001104
text: But, I want to check how much you've grown up as a Highlander.{nl}Yognomes at 63_3 of Bracken Forest would fit you well. I will teach you the skills after that.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001105
text: Defeat 30 Yognomes at 63_3 of Bracken Forest.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001106
text: Well done. As I promised to you, I will teach you high level skills that can be used with two handed swords.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001107
text: Have you become familiar with using shields in battles?{nl}Okay then I will teach you the skills of Peltasta now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001108
text: And of course we should first find out whether you would be able to handle the high level skills.{nl}Defeat the monsters at 63_3 of Bracken Forest and collect the crystals from the monsters.{nl}You can get two from the demons so please go after the demons aggressively.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001109
text: But, there are restrictions.{nl}Firstly, I only admit the crystals which you've obtained while equipped with shiedls.{nl}Secondly, if you become unable to fight, the crystals you would have collected until that point will be all cancelled.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001110
text: Defeat the monsters and collect the crystals while equipped with a shield.{nl}This is to check your surviving skills.{nl}For your reference, it will be efficient to defeat the demons.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001111
text: You seem competent enough as a Peltasta.{nl}Congratulations. As I promised to you, I will teach you skills that are one level higher.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001112
text: It's easy to teach you how to use a spear, but your mind is important.{nl}There is a location to test applicants like you.{nl}The assignment is simple. It's just irritating.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001113
text: Come back after defeating 30 Yognomes from Bracken Forest 63_3.{nl}If you do so, I will acknowledge your skills.{nl}In my feelings, you would pass the test easily.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001114
text: If you have a trouble with Yognomes, then it wouldn't be that bad to look for another way.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001115
text: You want to become a Barbarian? Can you endure the training?{nl}Good. I will test you to see whether you can at least imitate some fightings.{nl}If this was our hometown, they would have passed the test. Do you want to receive it?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001116
text: The most important quality of Swordsman is belligerence.{nl}You should attack anyone who shows hostility to the ones that you should protect.{nl}Think of Yognomes at 63_3 of Bracken Forest as your barriers and destroy all of them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001117
text: I thought you are wiry since you told me that you wanted to become a Barbarian... Are you going to give up?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001118
text: There are some useful people here even in this place.{nl}Good. On behalf of Walter at Klaipeda, I will teach you the skills of Barbarian.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001119
text: Have you heard the stories?{nl}Some of the refugees that were coming to Orsha are hurt and fell near Lemprasa Pond.{nl}We should save them!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001120
text: I've endowed the blessing onto this special ointment.{nl}Use this ointment to cure the refugees who are laid near Lemprasa Pond.{nl}After curing all refugees, I will acknowledge you as a true cleric.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001121
text: If it was not the order of the master, I would have gone there.{nl}I have no one to trust except for you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001122
text: It is so fortunate that a big problem didn't occur to them.{nl}It's all because of the devotion that you've shown to us.{nl}You look competent enough to progress to the last stage of Cleric.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001123
text: I think the time has come to tell your religious belief to the goddesses and receive the blessings.{nl}Pray to the goddesses near Orsha and dedicate these goods.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001124
text: Go to the statues of the goddesses at Lemprasa Pond, Linked Bridges, and Paupys Dock.{nl}Return after dedicating the goods to all statues.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001125
text: There are no official steps when it comes to offerings.{nl}They're something you do when you want to repent of past mistakes.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001126
text: Well done. Aren't there any broken parts of the statues of the goddesses?{nl}You now have reached a higher stage.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001127
text: I am taking care of the refugees of Orsha with other priests.{nl}But, the herbs that should be used for the ointment has run out.{nl}The time has come to test for your advancement so I will give you a small assignment.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001128
text: I am looking for three kinds of herbs.{nl}Obtain the herbs from 63_1, 63_2 and 63_3 of Bracken Forest.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001129
text: You will see the first herb when you dig into the pile of tree leaves near the exit which leads to the next territory.{nl}The second herb is growing on the region located below.{nl}The third herb has the yellow flower so you will easily find it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001130
text: The effects of the three herbs are not that different from each other.{nl}As I told you, don't forget this also tests for your advancement.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001131
text: Let's see... It surely is.{nl}When your good deeds accumulate like this, you will feel that your religious belief gets deeper.{nl}You've passed the test. From now on, you will be learning higher level Priest skills.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001132
text: Are you the one who wants to become a Bokor?{nl}Welcome. In order to become a Bokor, there is a test you must pass.{nl}Have you heard about it?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001133
text: Yes! You should have made Bokor dolls in order for you to be called a Bokor.{nl}Make the doll with this manual.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001134
text: Long time ago, the Master also became a Bokor after making Shaman Dolls.{nl}It is the ritual which has the history and the tradition.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001135
text: This Shaman Doll has the highest grade among the dolls which I've seen before!{nl}You seem to possess the attributes of Bokor.{nl}Now, you are the Bokor. Welcome!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001136
text: You want to become a Dievdirbys? Of course, I welcome you.{nl}The way of Dievdirbys is open to everyone.{nl}Just... If you could listen to one of my little requests.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001137
text: The end of the graving chisel has run out.{nl}I guess we should ask the blacksmith in Orsha.{nl}Tell him that it is my request and get the new graving chisel.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001138
text: I am sorry. I am counting on you until Orsha.{nl}I have matters to do here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001139
text: What's the matter? Ah.. I remember that Dievdirbys girl.{nl}But, what should I do. The chisel and the materials are all ran oout.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001140
text: I hope you can get the materials.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001141
text: There will be times when you discover the chunks that are accumulated with metals from Yognomes at 63_3 of Bracken Forest.{nl}If you could bring those, I will make an useful graving chisel for you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001142
text: The metals that are accumulated in the bodies of the monsters get crumpled together at 63_3 of Bracken Forest.{nl}Defeat Yognomes and collect the metal chunks.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001143
text: Yes. This would be enough.{nl}Crafting is not that hard so if you wait a bit, I will make it for you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001144
text: It is almost done.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001145
text: It is a decent object so you would be able to stand for some time.{nl}Give it to him.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001146
text: Ask him to come by Orsha sometimes.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001147
text: Damn... I knew that it was taking longer than expected, but I didn't know that you made such efforts.{nl}Thank you. Of course, you are a Dievdirbys from now on.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001148
text: You've improved a lot! Everyone would acknowledge your skills.{nl}It's just.. you fall little short according to my father's standards.{nl}I will help you to reach a higher stage.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001149
text: Good. Let's see one more time if you are competent enough to learn higher level skills.{nl}I will see how you handle existing skills well.{nl}I don't care which monster, just defeat any monster using Highlander's skills.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001150
text: Defeating monsters with the skills of Highlander. I think it's easy for the last assignment.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001151
text: I've seen you use the skills which you previously learned really well.{nl}You won't have a problem learning higher level skills without any problem.{nl}I think I can say to anyone proudly that I am the one who taught you the skills.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001152
text: You would easily defeat any kinds of demons.{nl}But, in order to defeat the real bad demons, you will have to try hard.{nl}I will open the true way of Peltasta for you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001153
text: But, you should at least pass the minimum requirement.{nl}Come back after defeating Chapparitions from Karolis Springs.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001154
text: Chapparitions are not hard if we think about the courage that you've shown us so far.{nl}Don't worry too much.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001155
text: Very good! I can now acknowledge you as a fellow soldier.{nl}I should report to the master individually.{nl}I will show you the true power of Peltastas with my authority.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001156
text: Your growth is really surprising. I can feel something different in you.{nl}I am sure you will become stronger. Are you ready to proceed to the next level?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001157
text: There is a monster which I faced long time ago.{nl}It ran away and I was worried that it may hurt the other people.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001158
text: There is a rumor that he appeared again.{nl}Please kill it on behalf of me.{nl}And as a proof, please bring me the chisel that is on the body of the monster.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001159
text: Defeat Sparnasman at 64_2 of Bracken Monastery and bring me the tip of my spear.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001160
text: That is definitely the tip of my spear wihich was on the body of the monster.{nl}I can proudly say that our competent Hopelite defeated it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001161
text: Hmm... You've become very strong.{nl}I didn't know that you've completed the training that hard. You will be able to learn the skills of the next stage.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001162
text: Of course, I can't just teach you for free. Prove the strength you have!{nl}Without any enhancement effects on your body, come back after defeating the monsters at Feretory Hills.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001163
text: Prove the strength of the sword.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001164
text: You are way more useful than I expected.{nl}My brother would be glad to know that a competant lad like you became a Barbarian.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001165
text: You know well about the structure of the shield.{nl}You can come to me anyime to learn.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001166
text: Cataphract. {nl}I don't know if it would fit you well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001167
text: I like your spirit.{nl}Try defeating Beast-type monsters at Feretory Hills.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001168
text: Since Medzio Diena, the monsters that inflict the most harm are the Beast-type.{nl}Defeat the Beast-type monsters at Feretory Hills.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001169
text: I think you would be able to reach a higher level Krivis.{nl}Do you want to receive the test?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001170
text: With this jewel, please go to Feretory Hills.{nl}Make scars on the monsters and use the power of the jewel to purify the monsters.{nl}When you do that, ashes will remain. Please gather them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001171
text: Don't worry. It is the sacred flame so it would not harm you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001172
text: Your competence has been proven as a result.{nl}Congratulations on your entrance to the last stage of Krivis.{nl}I want you to help the ones who are stuggling with the power you have.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001173
text: Now, it is time to leave for a far place and spread the blessing of the goddesses.{nl}But, we never know what kind of dangers are ahead of us.{nl}Especially the times like nowadays.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001174
text: Please show us that at least you can protect yourself.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001175
text: The monsters at Feretory Hills would be enough.{nl}Come back after defeating them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001176
text: We can't save other people by just relying on the divinity.{nl}There are times that we need to use some force.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001177
text: You won't have any trouble travelling far away.{nl}As a priest, please keep your mind and do your duties with all your heart.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001178
text: Now is the time to proceed to the next level of Bokor.{nl}I want to forecast your future as one of your collegues.{nl}Face the violent monsters and please bring me the cards that they drop.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001179
text: The master told me that it is already decided that who and what cards will be brought.{nl}However, with my skills, I don't know what cards you would bring.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001180
text: The light, the salavation, the vice and the cursed jewel..? These are the everything I can read.{nl}They are all rarely written. Especially the last word is significant.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001181
text: It's your duty to interpret them.{nl}But, you look like someone with the abnormal destiny unlike other people.{nl}I hope that you can fulfill all your duties.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001182
text: When I was parted with Tesla, he gave me an assignment.{nl}I have to carve some special sculpture, but the materials are hard to obtain.{nl}He told me to request to someone who can be relied on and I think you are the right person.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001183
text: You will be able to encounter a monster called Sparnasman at 64_2 of Bracken Forest.{nl}Please bring me the horn on your head.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001184
text: He didn't ask me to save him myself, but he wants me to ask someone who can be relied on...{nl}I think he is also testing my benevolence.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001185
text: You brought them well. I can tell they are the materials that I asked you.{nl}As I promised, I will teach you high level skills of Dievdirbys.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001186
text: You want to enter the way of Sadhu?{nl}Okay. Although it's hard for me to take the official test since only my spirit is here...{nl}I will test you with my method.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001187
text: I will pass you my energies to you.{nl}When you use that energy at Feretory Hills, a part of monsters' spirits will be mixed.{nl}Defeat that monster and come back after absorbing the spirit.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001188
text: It seems that the spirits of the monsters are not enough yet.{nl}I can't open the way of Sadhu yet.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001189
text: I can feel the great power of the spirit in you...{nl}I can tell how great is your competence. Congratulations on your entrance to the way of Sadhu.{nl}I will teach you the skills of Sadhu although only my spirit is here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001190
text: You want to enter the way of Paladin?{nl}It is different from other priestsl. In order to become a Paladin, you have to possess strong power.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001191
text: Good. You're skilled.{nl}Okay then, shall I test you? Come back after defeating monsters at Feretory Hills.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001192
text: We, Paladins stand at the front line when we fight against the demons.{nl}With the uncertain skills you have, you would soon experience something unfortunate.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001193
text: You've done well way better than I expected.{nl}As I promised, I will appoint you as a Paladin on behalf of the Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001194
text: Now is the time to take the last test.{nl}Are you ready to show me the skills that you've accumulated?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001195
text: The Apsimesti Crossroads used to be the last test place for Hoplites.{nl}Many of your seniors fought against the monsters until their spears worn out.{nl}I will test your qualifications by seeing you gathering those broken spears.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001196
text: This test isn't just to measure your strength.{nl}The stage which you are trying to reach can't be reached that easily.{nl}You also have to check how others tried to reach that level.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001197
text: Well done. In the future, a new hoplite will follow the traces of you.{nl}You are already at the master stage, but if there's anything lacking, please come visit me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001198
text: I can now call you a Rodelero.{nl}However, in order to become stronger, sometimes you should know your strength as well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001199
text: I think you are ready.{nl}If that's so, defeat the monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads without using a shield.{nl}In fact, face the monsters without equipping the monsters.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001200
text: The shields are the most reliable colleague of Rodelero.{nl}But, a Swordsman should be strong himself.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001201
text: I was able to check the potential again.{nl}As you know, my teaching is very strict so you should be well prepared.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001202
text: How about it, do you understand now what the piercing is?{nl}Okay, then let's get ready to proceed to the next level.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001203
text: Let's assume that the spear which can pierce any enemy is your arm.{nl}We can say the legs are your companion which give you the mobility.{nl}Defeat the enemies in Apsimesti Crossroads while mounted on a companion.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001204
text: If you don't get used to fighting agaist the others while mounted on a companion, give up on Cataphract.{nl}You don't have travel sickness right?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001205
text: You are going to become a good cavalry after the kingdom gets reconstructed in the future.{nl}Of course, until then, use the skills that I will teach you and do your duties at your best.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001206
text: You've passed all previous assignements and your growth rate is also amazing.{nl}You won't have any problem enetering the last stage of Bokor!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001207
text: No no. You shouldn't be satisfied too soon.{nl}Now, it is your turn to utilize the skills you've learned so far.{nl}Defeat the monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001208
text: The skills which you've learned will be used effectively in the battles.{nl}It wouldn't be that dangerous in Apsimesti Crossroads.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001209
text: Well done!{nl}Now your journey as a Bokor has really started.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001210
text: I barely got in contact with Tesla!{nl}I've wrote you in the letter and he surely has high expectations in you.{nl}So, how about you try out for the last level of Dievdirbys?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001211
text: By completing the request that was sent to us, I will treat that as your advancement test.{nl}The request is to repair the statue of the goddesses, but we need the materials for the perfumed oil that will be used for the repair.{nl}Please gather the lumps of oil from Ashrongs at Aqueduct region.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001212
text: When you gather the lumps of oil from Ashrongs, I will refine it and make it into the perfumed oil.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001213
text: We've completed the preparation stage.{nl}If you wait a bit, I will make you perfumed oil.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001214
text: The perfumed oil has been completed.{nl}With this perfumed oil, please repair Vakarine Statue at Orsha and Fedimian.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001215
text: I heard that one can easily move to Fedimian by using the power of the Goddess Statue.{nl}We would be able to reduce some time.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001216
text: I think the citizens at the two cities will have hope by just looking at the clean statues.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001217
text: You've come back from a long way. Tesla would compliment for sure.{nl}You would become great from now on.{nl}I guess I have a rival now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001218
text: You've come at the right time.{nl}I've heard that the number of Red Triamublos has increased a lot at Apsimesti Crossroads and they are threatening the villagers.{nl}If you want to step forward as a true Sadhu, please share your abilities.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001219
text: For the next test, face against stronger monsters.{nl}Are you ready?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001220
text: Please take these relics to The Starving Demon's Way.{nl}When you react the relics to the abandoned altar up there, the monsters would appear.{nl}You know what's next even if I don't tell you anything right?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001221
text: The abandoned altar is at the dead end of Starving Demon's Way up there.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001222
text: Well done. You've stepped into a higher level.{nl}You possess the skills which I want to show to my ungle who is a master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001223
text: You've improved again. My uncle will be surprised.{nl}You should take the test to go to the last stage.{nl}We need the way to prove your skill.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001224
text: I know a suitable opponent who you can fight against.{nl}Monsters called Gaigalas are going crazy at Tenants' Farm.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001225
text: I can see how great you are.{nl}But, in order to advance, we need more clear verification.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001226
text: In fact, I thought it's going to be dangerous, but I guess I misunderstood your skills.{nl}Well done. Anyone would acknowledge you as a high level Paladin.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001227
text: I am looking for the whereabouts of Goddess Zemyna.{nl}Everyone knows that the goddess has disappeared.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001228
text: Those relics belong to the goddesses.{nl}You shouldn't insult the dead by joking in the name of the goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001229
text: What?{nl}What have you brought here?{nl}Ah... it doesn't matter. If you are okay, can you help me out?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001230
text: You've brought them well. Thanks.{nl}I want to repay you at the village..{nl}We, villagers do not really welcome outsiders though..{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001231
text: On your way back, you've seen the demons with the gigantic axe and the girl who was being chased after the demon?{nl}The demon with the great axe is the Demon Lord Zaura...{nl}The Revelator and the girl shoudn't meet... It's not something normal...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001232
text: I should tell this to the village and let villagers know.{nl}We can't let outsiders fall into danger due to the matters in our village.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001233
text: What? Are you the Revelator?{nl}If that's so, have you come here after dreaming about the disaster?{nl}.. If that's so, you may be the Revelator in the folkore that is passing down in our village.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001234
text: In our village, the forecast which was left by the goddess Laima is being passed down as a folklore.{nl}When the village was in danger, the Revelator who came to chase after the dream with the sacred light{nl}It was about defeating the evil energy and saving the village.{nl}It's not time for this. We should get to the village and find out more about it.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001235
text: I will go to the village and find out more about the folklore.{nl}I want you to retrieve the food which the ferrets had took away.{nl}Although, we don't welcome outsiders, if you could retrieve the food that was stolen by the ferrets, the villagers would help you out.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001236
text: Is that you? Are you the Revelator who Leja was talking about?{nl}I heard that the village priests that were attacked by ferrets were saved by you with the ray.{nl}You've finally come. Good. The Revelator who's going to save the village has come.{nl}Ohoh... Goddess Laima... Thank you. You didn't abandon us...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001237
text: What is that? Isn't that the food that was stolen by ferrets?!{nl}Hey guys! Look at this! The Revelator retrieved the stolen food!{nl}You've really come here to save our village.{nl}Thanks. Thank you very much.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001238
text: Leja has left to Zehara to look for something that would help her.{nl}There is a statue which was carved by the ancestors who used to serve for Goddess Laima.{nl}She said Laima must have prepared something on the statue of the goddess.{nl}If you are planning to go to Zeraha, listen to my story before you go.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001239
text: A long time ago, when Goddess Laima disappeared after forecasting the ominous future,{nl}She was worried about us and asked Goddess Lada to take care of the village.{nl}However, unlike Laima's forecast, the village was peaceful.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001240
text: Medzio Diena came in the middle of peaceful days.{nl}The demons kidnapped Lada and the river had turned red.{nl}The ones who drank the water from the river suffered and the fruits that consumed the water from the river got big.{nl}The big fruits were not edible like the red water.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001241
text: After the disaster swept the village, villagers believe the folklore that the Revelator who came to the village after dreaming about the disaster{nl}will defeat the evil energy and save the village with the light.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001242
text: The most urgent issue is that the ferrets that were gentle before turned violent.{nl}We want to save Lada, but since violent ferrets are attacking the village{nl}and stealing the food, everyone is suffering.{nl}I think the Demon Totem which was built by the demons near the ferrets' hideout here turned the ferrets violent...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001243
text: Since the ferrets are protecting the Demon Totem, it's hard for us to break the Demon Totem.{nl}For the village, can you break the Demon Totem?{nl}If that's so, we would be able to help you to save Lada.{nl}I am sure that you would be able to restore the ferrets.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001244
text: You are truly the Revelator in the folklore.{nl}Since you've broke the Demon Totem, the ferrets will turn gentle again.{nl}Thanks. I will check the ferrets by sending my grandchildren.{nl}While you were away, a mysterious girl came to the village.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001245
text: The mysterious girl disappeared into Zeraha after going through here without any words.{nl}Our ancestors told us that whenever Laima comes to our village, a warm atmosphere surrounds the village.{nl}It was short, but when that girl came to the village, I felt the warm energy which our ancestors told us.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001246
text: I am sure Laima has left her to guide you.{nl}Chase after the girl.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001247
text: Revelator, have you drank the red water before?{nl}If you had drank it before, I am sure you won't be able to talk to me now.{nl}Even if you are really thirsty, you shouldn't drink the red water. If you drink it, you will suffer from it.{nl}It is so toxic. The fruits that grew by consuming the water got huge and weren't edible.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001248
text: I was once lost in a forest and I was really thirsty then.{nl}I found a container with fruit juice in it which the ferrets had accumulated.{nl}Dying from thirst or dying from the ferrets, dying is the same.{nl}So I drank the juice without the ferrets knowing and nothing happened to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001249
text: I don't know what was done to it, but I think it can be used for drinkable water.{nl}Now, the water started to surface so we should have the water.{nl}Can you gather the fruit juice from the ferrets? I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001250
text: We are in trouble. While you were out to obtain the fruit juice, ferrets attacked the village and stole the food.{nl}It won't work this way. Even if we retrieve the food, the ferrets will attack the village again.{nl}I will fix the bad habit of the ferrets this time.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001251
text: Look for the food which the ferrets have stolen and spice it with the red water.{nl}The ferrets that consumed it will suffer from pain and will not ever come back to steal food again.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001252
text: The polluted red water can be obtained from the well down there.{nl}Please pollute the food that was stolen by the ferrets with the red water.{nl}Especially, you should pollute the beef jerkies. Ferrets really love beef jerkies.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001253
text: I know it doesn't feel good to pollute the food, but...{nl}That is the best way in the long term.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001254
text: We can call this kind of situation one step back and two steps forward.{nl}I hope the ferrets enjoy the beef jerkies and never come back again.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001255
text: Ah, Revelator. Thank you for destroying the Demon Totem.{nl}I've went to see the ferrets, but they are still violent.{nl}I think the influence of the totem is still remaining.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001256
text: I heard Widas who is a Dievdirbys is trying to make{nl}the piece which has the opposite effect when compared to the Demon Totem.{nl}Please ask Widas if the piece has been completed.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001257
text: This sculpture that possesses the opposite effects to Demon Totems...{nl}Wait a minute...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001258
text: I heard that the demons are turning the ferrets violent using the totem{nl}so I tried creating a sculpture which possesses the opposite effects of the Demon Totem...{nl}We are still experimenting on it, but I think now is the best chance to test it although it is still in an experimental stage since the totem has disappeared.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001259
text: I will give you the sculpture which I was creating..{nl}Place it near the ferrets and observe the behavior of the ferrets...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001260
text: The ferrets have become more violent...?{nl}Damn... Did I fail...{nl}I am sorry... You are not hurt?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001261
text: Ah... We are not going to give up on the pieces... It is maybe because the demons' brainwashing has not been removed yet...{nl}When Druid Benes who is investigating on the ferrets on Zeraha comes back, I think I should seek help from Benes...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001262
text: Ah, Revelator!{nl}What? That mysterious girl may be the guide prepared by Laima?{nl}The girl ran away there after being chased by ferrets!{nl}I was going to chase them, but since Ferrets are going crazy, I can't chase them...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001263
text: It's not the time for this... Revelator.{nl}Since the ferrets are chasing after the girl, maybe the ferrets are looking for the traces of the girl.{nl}I guess I should look for the girl while defeating ferrets. We should hurry.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001264
text: I hope the girl is safe... I should've gone after her...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001265
text: ...The girl was kidnapped by the demon holding a gigantic axe? That's not good...{nl}If the demon was holding a gigantic axe, I am sure it is the Demon Lord, Zaura.{nl}Demon Lord Zaura commands the demons that attacked this place and kidnapped Lada.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001266
text: When Zaura kidnapped the girl, were ferrets with the girl?{nl}If that's so, I think Zaura left the kidnapped girl to the ferrets.{nl}Since the ferrets know more about the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001267
text: I think I know where the ferrets had hidden the girl. However, it is dangerous to go without any preparations.{nl}I know how to make the incense that makes the ferrets lose their conciousness. If you use this incense, you will be able to defeat the ferrets easily.{nl}But, the problem is that we don't have enough Drowsy Herbs.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001268
text: Drowsy herbs are growing from down there.{nl}I will prepare to make the incense so can you get me Drowsy Herbs?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001269
text: You don't have to worry about inhaling the incense.{nl}I've made it to be effective only on ferrets.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001270
text: The incense has been completed.{nl}I will tell you a few locations where the ferrets may have taken the girl.{nl}Don't worry even if the ferrets are protecting the girl.{nl}When you burn this incense on a bonfire, the ferrets will lose their conciousness so rescue the girl while they are unconscious.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001271
text: The goddess... under... that... sapling...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001272
text: Savior... I am Laima, the goddess of the destiny.{nl}You followed the girl who is the incarnate of my will.{nl}In this forest, my sister, Lada was captured by Zaura.{nl}Zaura is creating something evil called the 'Kruvina' with the vitalities of Lada.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001273
text: Save Lada who is captured in Seir Rainforest and stop the demons' plans to make Kruvina.{nl}The only one who can get rid of the disaster is you.{nl}Please take this orb. It would help you a lot.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001274
text: Ah... I didn't expect I would see a human here...! Please help me!{nl}I am called Druid Benes. I am trying to find the reason why the ferrets are coopering with the demons.{nl}Recently, I found out that I will be able to talk to the ferrets using the spell of the Druids.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001275
text: But, the problem is that I touched the ferrets too many times while looking for other methods.{nl}Even if I turn into a ferret, they attack me as if they remember my odor.{nl}Can you turn into a ferret on behalf of me and find out about their plans?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001276
text: You would be able to talk with the ferrets naturally. {nl}Talk with the ferrets and find out why they are cooperating with the demons.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001277
text: Did the ferrets really tell you so? Of course, I think there's no reason they should lie...{nl}But, I can't believe it... The ferrets were once very kind.{nl}We were good with the ferrets until the demons came here. They spontaneously attacked us...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001278
text: I should find out how much hostility the ferrets have towards humans.{nl}I will try to turn a piece of wood into the appearance of a wounded villager.{nl}When you set this wood, it would look like a wounded villager to anyone.{nl}Set this near the ferrets and find out if the ferrets attack.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001279
text: If the ferrets even attack the wounded villager, that will be really dangerous...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001280
text: Did the ferrets attack the woods with the spell?{nl}That's not good. That means the ferrets attack humans indiscriminately...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001281
text: It became apparent as a result of the experiment. The ferrets are dangerous now.{nl}However, since we can't fight against all the ferrets, We should kick them out from the village.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001282
text: I possess some terrible odor which the ferrets don't like.{nl}Light up a bonfire and when you burn the terrible odor, the ferrets will run away after smelling the odor.{nl}Please spread the odor near Bellai Forest Village where the villagers are gathered around.{nl}The odor is little... disgusting to humans so please keep that in mind...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001283
text: I guess we should make more incense.{nl}Since we don't know when the effects of the incense would run out.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001284
text: Was the smell terrible?{nl}Thanks. Now, the ferrets wouldn't be able to come near the village.{nl}I feel bad because I had used the terrible odor on the ferrets due to the bad tricks of the demons.{nl}When I go back to the village, I should look for a way to restore the ferrets to their original state with Dievdirbys Widas.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001285
text: Thank you for saving me...{nl}Although weak, I can feel the power of Laima in you...{nl}You are the savior who Laima talked about before...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001286
text: Laima forecasted that a disaster would come to this forest which won't be prevented by me.{nl}And she also said the savior who brings the orb which she has left would be able to solve the disaster in this forest.{nl}Everything goes as Laima forecasted.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001287
text: Zaura wants to create strong Kruvina using my vitalities.{nl}Kruvina is a demons' object which uses humans' vitalities and it amplifies the power of the holder.{nl}But, if one can't stand the power of the Kruvina, it destroys the body of the holder.{nl}The demons are trying to use the Kruvina on plants and kill all humans with the plants.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001288
text: The reason why the water in the forest turned red and the trees and the fruits grew gigantic is all due to the Kruvina.{nl}The demons that were satisfied with the results wanted to create a stronger Kruvina,{nl}and eventually kidnapped me and use my vitalities to create the Kruvina.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001289
text: Savor... The Kruvina should not exist in this world.{nl}Only you can destroy the Kruvina and stop the conspiracy of the demons...{nl}Now is your chance since Zaura received critical damage and ran away!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001290
text: Kruvina hasn't been completed, but since it is being created with the vitalities of the goddess{nl}it wouldn't be possible to break it with human force.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001291
text: But, you are the Revelator...{nl}The power of Laima you possess coupled with my power would be able to destroy the Kruvina.{nl}But, all binding devices and the Kruvina creating devices are suppresing my power that is remaining in me.{nl}Please destroy the binding devices and the Kruvina creating devices. When my power comes back, I will share it to you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001292
text: Well done. Kruvina's growth will stop in incompleted status.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001293
text: Although it is incomplete, I can't just leave the Kruvina since it is dangerous.{nl}Before the demons misuse the Kruvina, we should destroy it.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001294
text: Now that my power is back which was suppressed by the Kruvina creation device, I will share my power with you.{nl}Put my power into the orb of Laima and destroy the Kruvina in the name of the savior.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001295
text: A black demon called the Beholder took the unfinished Kruvina and disappeared...{nl}It's okay... Savior... It's not your fault..{nl}If you hadn't stopped the demons, they would have finished the Kruvina using the power of the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001296
text: You've done a big job.{nl}I am sure Laima who is my sister foresaw the Beholder.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001297
text: Thank you for saving me. Savior.{nl}As a result, we were able to block the plans of the demons.{nl}Now, I am going to cooperate with the villagers to stabilize the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001298
text: Before Laima started drifting, she requested me something.{nl}When the savior appears and resolves all the disasters in the village,{nl}she wants me to take the savior to the hands of the Laima statue.{nl}Take the orb of the goddess which Laima has prepared and go to the hands of Laima at Zeraha.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001299
text: I didn't expect Laima was captured by Giltine...{nl}Savior... I am counting on you.{nl}You are the only one who can stop the consipiracy of Giltine and save Laima.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001300
text: I will pass you the power in the orb to you.{nl}I hope it helps you when you do your duty..{nl}I will stabilize this place and restore my power to look for other sisters...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001301
text: The shrine for the goddesses was built here originally, but the demons broke the shrines.{nl}I am trying to restore the shrine with the villagers for Lada and Laima who will come back one day.{nl}But, many demons are still roaming around.{nl}We should kick the demons out in order to restore the shrine.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001302
text: I don't know why demons are still remaining here after seeing the Demon Lord expelled.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001303
text: There is a huge city called Fedimian which is not that far away from this forest.{nl}Among the masters in Fedimian, there may be someone who knows how to purify the land.{nl}I have to look for him, but I can't leave now since I am too busy..{nl}Can you go get an advice from the master who knows how to purify the land on behalf of me?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001304
text: Gina Greene

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001305
text: Ahah... I know how to purify land.{nl}I can't leave now, so I will write down the magic circle of the purification on the scroll.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001306
text: Among the masters in Fedimian, there must be someone who knows how to purify the land!{nl}There must be someone...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001307
text: You've come back soon. Have you found the method?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001308
text: The Druid Master wrote you the scroll himself?{nl}That means what's drawn on that scroll is the magic circle of the purification!{nl}This is more than I expected. Thank you!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001309
text: Now, with the scroll of the purification that we've obtained, we now have to purify the land.{nl}It seems that the demon totems that are standing across the land are causing the pollution.{nl}But, due to the demons that are protecting demon totems, we can't go near..{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001310
text: Thank you so much for resolving matters that were difficult for the villagers!{nl}Your strong power helped us a lot.{nl}When the shrine for the goddesses gets built here in the future, please stop by!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001311
text: Now, I am going to work with the villagers to restore the shrine for the goddesses.{nl}I am looking for where to build the shrine and I found up there the land with full of vitalities.{nl}The demons rushed in so I couldn't look at it carefully, but the energy from the ground{nl}would help us restoring the vitalities.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001312
text: Even now, Kruvina is getting completed slowly.{nl}We should hurry.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001313
text: If we break the device that absorbs the vitalities, my vitalities would not be passed to Kruvina.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001314
text: Let's do it little more.{nl}Please hold on little longer. Savior.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001315
text: Please purify the land which the demons polluted.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001316
text: The binding device is suppressing all my remaining power and binding me.{nl}The binding device is not that strong so you would be able to destroy it with your power.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001317
text: You've done well.{nl}The power that was locked inside the binding device has come back a bit.{nl}Now, we should break the absorbing device.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001318
text: The device is absorbing my vitalities using the magic circle.{nl}It was created to absorb only the vitalities of innocent goddess so it will stop working when it absorbs other vitalities.{nl}Especially, when the blood of the demon which is opposite from my vitality gets mixed, ii would resist a lot.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001319
text: You are truly the savior prepared by Laima.{nl}We now only have Kruvina controlling device left.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151022_001320
text: Kruvina controlling device accumulates the vitalities of the goddesses and sends some amount to Kruvina{nl}and suppresses Kruvina creation.{nl}It moves by the demonic energy of the demons so when you use the orb of the goddess{nl}the device would be overloaded and stop working.

Leja told you that before she goes out to look for the girl, she would make the scent that would make the ferrets unconscious so she wants you to bring some Drowsy Herb.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002094
text: So these are the samples. Now, the conditions for the deal have been fulfilled.{nl}Okay. I will make you stronger.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002095
text: There is a problem at 36_1 of the valley area.{nl}Just put the Namott of Purification which I gave to you on the place where demonic energy is strongest.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002096
text: I... didn't expect to see someone here..{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002097
text: You better run away.{nl}Lots of demons are here.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002098
text: A little while ago, a demon appeared at the place where there is the owl sculputre and controlling the monsters.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002099
text: Why there? Are you insane?{nl}They are demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002100
text: I don't know how strong you are, but...{nl}I am going to stay here. If you are gonna go, go alone.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002101
text: I was being chased by the demons and ran upto here.{nl}I don't want to see any more troubles.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002102
