text: There were no demons and only other monsters?{nl}Oh, I'm glad...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002103
text: Even so, you don't look like you are hurt... it seems that you are stronger than I expected.{nl}I see you differently now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002104
text: I've already gave up on one salvation and I couldn't do anything on Medzio Diena.{nl}However, even so, I can't give up everything.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002105
text: I will tell you in due time so please collect some Green Infro Holder Eggs.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002106
text: The eggs of Green Infro Holder are the key to binding the souls.{nl}Now, we need to substantiate it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002107
text: Don't think of it as unpleasant. {nl}This is the best I can do for now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002108
text: Hey!{nl}Please help me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002109
text: My friends are being attacked by the demons!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002110
text: Please save my friends from the demons. I beg you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002111
text: If you were not there, we would have killed brutally by now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002112
text: At AA village.{nl}He is hiding, but the demons would find him quickly.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002113
text: Thank you for helping us. I am Rose. We are merchants who go various places to sell the goods.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002114
text: We've decided to sell the goods to XX village which is my hometown and visited XX village.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002115
text: But, there were no one in the village. There were really no one to think about they've gone to pick up the brackens.{nl}Therefore, we looked around various places to look for the villagers and ran away here after being attacked by the demons.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002116
text: While running away, we've got seperated from our colleagues. It is important to find whereabouts of the villagers, but I am more worried whether my colleagues weren't attacked by the demons.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002117
text: Are you really helping us?{nl}I guess the goddess hasn't abandoned us yet. It's not common these days which a competent person like you help someone who needs help.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002118
text: We better use the olfactory sense of Rash. But, while Rash was running away from the demons, it consumed lots of stamina

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002119
text: If we recover Rash's stamina, it will be easy to find our colleagues.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002120
text: This is the potion to recover stamina.{nl}I will give it to Rash.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002121
text: Due to the potion you gave to me, Rash recovered its stamina fast.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002122
text: I am going to make Rash to smell the odor that is coming out from the goods of my colleagues. Rash will guide you to the place where our colleagues are.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002123
text: If Rash starts to wander around, let it smell the odor from the good I've handed over to you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002124
text: I will pray so that my colleagues are safe.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002125
text: How did you know I am here?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002126
text: How did Rash come here..{nl}Who are you and how have you come here with Rash?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002127
text: I was able to encounter with my colleagues because of you.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002128
text: Now, le'ts chase the whereabouts of XX villagers.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002129
text: I was too busy running away from the demons so I could not think about my luggages well. There are many goods that can be sold at expensive prices in the luggage. If we go out of the village, the demons would definitely run at me and attack me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002130
text: Can you look for the luggage on behalf of me?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002131
text: What happened to my luggage?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002132
text: You've found my luggage.{nl}Thank you so much for finding my luggage.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002133
text: You saved us from the demons. Even so, we can't guarantee that we are now safe from the demons.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002134
text: There are also Beast-type monsters around AA village other than the demons so it looks more dangerous.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002135
text: I can't stay here since it's too unstable. Can you defeat the demons and the beast monsters around AA village?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002136
text: I guess I should think about doing other jobs.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002137
text: The demons and the beast monsters are still wandering around, but I am relieved a bit since at least they are not close enough to come to the village.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002138
text: I was attacked by the demons while picking up the herbs. Fortunately, I saved my life, but I got hut a lot.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002139
text: Please pick up the herbs that can cure the wounds. I think I may be better off if I get it on.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002140
text: I want to go pick up the herbs myself, but it hurts a lot whenever I move.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002141
text: Have you obtained the herbs?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002142
text: Please give to me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002143
text: The pain still remains even after rubbing the herb on the wound area.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002144
text: It seems that I am addicted to the poison that is being used by the demons.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002145
text: It hurts a lot on the wound areas and I have hard time breathing..{nl}When you tell my symptoms to

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002146
text: It is the deadly poison. We don't have enough time. I will give you the medicine so please give to the patient fast.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002147
text: Due to the medicine, I have less pain and I can breathe well.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002148
text: Let's check what happened at the village to find out whereabouts of the villagers.{nl}I want you to check A, B and C districts.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002149
text: I'll have a look in other places.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002150
text: Have you found any clues to to find the whereabouts of the villagers?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002151
text: I've checked the footsteps of the demons in the village. I am sure the demons have intruded into the village. There are no corpses and the house looks normal so the demons are not planning to steal.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002152
text: Then, why and what for, demons took the villagers?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002153
text: There. The marble of Polki. As I arrived the village, I saw the marble of Polki dropped on the ground.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002154
text: The marble of Polki can be an important clue to look for the villagers.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002155
text: Let's look for the marble of Polki.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002156
text: I can't see the marble of Polki anymore.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002157
text: I think Polki dropped the marble, but we can't just find it.{nl}Let's look around.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002158
text: I am sure Polki dropped the marble around here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002159
text: XX Villager

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002160
text: W-who... are you!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002161
text: A-are you... on the same side with the demons?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002162
text: Oh goddess! Thank you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002163
text: If it wasn't you, we would all have died.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002164
text: Demons told us that they are going to use the braken and use us as the source of the divine tree! We should just look for someone who is qualified.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002165
text: Demons intruded into the village and took the people away.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002166
text: Demons were taking the villagers and heading towards the monastery. Demons stopped while taking us for a long time and then wizards appeared.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002167
text: The wizard has done some unidentified ritual to the villagers.{nl}When he did the ritual to the villagers, there weren't any unique responses, but I was able to see the response when we did the ritual to your brother, Edmundas.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002168
text: The wizard ordered the demons to take Edmundas seperately.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002169
text: The wizard threatened us. We've told the wizard that Edmundas has sister who is you.{nl}And I also described your appearances.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002170
text: After hearing the information about you, the wizard told us that

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002171
text: Kruvina is already prepared and the giant brackens

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002172
text: would soon spurt out the spores of the death.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002173
text: And he continued,

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002174
text: if someone with the qualifications are ready, all humans will die.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002175
text: Your spirits will be used as sources for the divine trees.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002176
text: After hearing the words from the wizard, I ran away to let the lord of Orsha know it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002177
text: Let's go to the monastery fast

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002178
text: Herbalist Ash

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002179
text: While I was picking up the herbs, the demons appeared and attacked me. Fortunately, I ran away, but I am scared whether the demon would attack me again.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002180
text: Starting from a few months ago, the demon started to appear at Knidos Forest.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002181
text: Because of you, the place seems to be stabilized a bit.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002182
text: As I was moving around to pick up the herbs, it was my first time to see the demons picking up the grass. I am not sure whether or not the demons are plotting something. I guess I should check which grass they are picking up.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002183
text: Have you checked what grass did the demons extract?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002184
text: As I expected. {nl}The demons are actually extracting the herbs that are highly toxic.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002185
text: If we process this herb further, it would become a deadly poison to humans. It is so certain that the demons are extracting these herbs. I guess I should do something so that the demons would not be able to pick up the herbs. I will sprinkle the body fluid of the monsters to kill the herbs.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002186
text: I won't let the demons do what they want to do.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002187
text: This would be enough.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002188
text: Sprinkle the body fluid of the monsters onto the herbs

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002189
text: Sprinkle the body fluid of the monsters onto the place where there are herbs.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002190
text: Since there are no more herbs, the demons would not be able to pick up the herbs anymore.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002191
text: You don't look like a settler, where are you coming from?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002192
text: {nl}Ahha! You are the one who came with the elder.{nl}To meet the elder, you better go to the camp fast.{nl}When a person comes out from Orsha, he would go meet the lord.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002193
text: You don't look like a settler.. Are you a traveler?{nl}There was an order from the lord for the settlers at the west district of Orsha to wait at Lemprasa Pond.{nl}When they come this far, the lord told us that he would send the soldiers and the officiers, but{nl}I can't see any people like them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002194
text: {nl}I am waiting for my friends so please go to the 2nd district and meet Bropen.{nl}He will tell you where Romanis has gone to.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002195
text: After Medzio Diena, there were no special signs until recently.{nl}Except for the people that came from far away or the people who have gone further to the south and came back after reaching the seas..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002196
text: Thank you so much for helping me!{nl}I was almost buried here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002197
text: {nl}How could he tell us to wait for the settlers in this dangerous place..{nl}When the families arrive, I guess I should move to another place..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002198
text: It seems that you've leveled up while fighting against Kepas.{nl}The ones who come from outside learn everything fast.{nl}I envy your pace of learning.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002199
text: {nl}{nl}If you have leveled up, you can become stronger by selecting one of the status.{nl}Do you want to check it now?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002200
text: That was a good selection.{nl}You can select a status as you level up.{nl}I hope you make a cautious decision.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002201
text: Are you looking for Romanas Elder?{nl}The elder has left to the camp direction with Reila.{nl}If you are gonna go to the camp, can you please pss this ointment?{nl}I almost died so I think I need to take some rest.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002202
text: I heard that the small village which is across the river turned into a ruin.{nl}If the lord didn't order us to move out, we would have been in danger as well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002203
text: This is the ointment which Bropen was going to bring.{nl}Have you brought it on behalf of Bropen? Thank you so much.{nl}Romanas elder has left to the camp district.{nl}I was waiting for Bropen.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002204
text: {nl}If you've leveled up, please use the skill points.{nl}When you use the skill points, you may obtain the new skills or enhance the existing skills!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002205
text: So you are coming? You've done well to help the villagers.{nl}I am gonna go to Orsha soon to meet the lord. Where are you going?{nl}There are no villages except for Orsha and Klaipeda which the adventurers are likely to visit at the southern part of the kingdom.{nl}If you are gonna go for a long journey, it would not be bad to stop by at Orsha and meet the lord.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002206
text: {nl}I am sorry, but if you are not busy, I want you to help the settlers.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002207
text: I heard someone is helping the settlers and it's you!{nl}On behalf of the elder, I really appreciate you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002208
text: {nl}Are you going to stop at Orsha?{nl}But, as you can see, I am little busy.{nl}If you can wait a bit, I will help you after helping these people.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002209
text: The story that the villages across the rivers, the fields and the mountains were stepped on by the monsters spreaded quickly..{nl}I've persuaded people that the soldiers would come and help us from Orsha, but as the story that the village right beside was attacked by the monsters spreaded, I couldn't reduce people's agitation.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002210
text: {nl}I thought the goddesses abandoned us. I was going to move the people to Klaipeda.{nl}At then, they ordered people to move on the land where the lord survived..{nl}The damages were too severe. He should've called us sooner..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002211
text: It's so hard for me to do this whole day.{nl}It may rather be better to follow the monsters like the soldiers.{nl}I want to help you... but, please also think about my situation.{nl}If I let you in first, they will be angry.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002212
text: I will cancel my words that I would follow the monsters like the soldiers a while ago.{nl}Even when we have more than 10 lives, it would not be enough.{nl}Because of you, I was able to block the monsters from going into Orsha.{nl}It was a substitution time, so I almost fell into danger.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002213
text: The settlers who were registering all ran away.. we will be free for some time.{nl}You are welcomed to go into Orsha.{nl}The lord is very strong and cold.{nl}Please go in front of the lord castle at the central square of Orsha.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002214
text: The settlers who have travelled for many days are trembling in anxiety.{nl}Most of them didn't get to see Orsha.{nl}They must have thought that the castle fortress which they heard from a rumor would protect them safely..{nl}You would know when you enter it, it has changed a lot since Medzio Diena..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002215
text: I am Innessa Hemandale who is controlling Orsha.{nl}Thank you for helping our citizens.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002216
text: We are recovering Orsha as you can see.{nl}With the soldiers we have at the moment, it is hard for us to protect Orsha.{nl}That's why we are moving all setters who have survived to Orsha even if that means we are going to have hard time for several years.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002217
text: The world turned wild, but neither the military nor the king protected us.{nl}You are the one who are helping the settlers right?{nl}Although, I am not competent enough, I am sure the goddesses want me to help you as well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002218
text: {nl}I want to make a medicine that would work well on your wounds.{nl}If you could collect Red Leaves from the 1st district, I will make the medicine using those!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002219
text: I am not the settler who Romanas Elder has brought.{nl}I am a person from the village that turned into a ruin recently.{nl}The hunters told us that they've discovered the monsters, but the lord didn't send us the squad.{nl}When my family and I ran away from the village, a messenger of the lord came and told us to move to Orsha.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002220
text: {nl}{nl}It would've been better if he had told us little sooner..{nl}We don't have any house, field or trees.{nl}What should we do to live on now..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002221
text: With this much amount, we would be able to make the medicine.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002222
text: {nl}Take it.{nl}Thank you for helping the settlers.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002223
text: The settlers who've survived are coming here.{nl}They are all exhausted since they ran away for several days.{nl}I am making an invigorating drink for them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002224
text: {nl}You would probably need it.{nl}If you could defeat the monsters at the 2nd district and get me Lempar mucus,{nl}I will make you an invigorating drink with that.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002225
text: I guess the lord had some different idea, but I don't know why he didn't order to move out sooner..{nl}Maybe the messenger was not diligent enough.{nl}I have lots of things to ask if I meet the lord.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002226
text: I think we have enough Lempar muscus.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002227
text: {nl}Okay. Please take this.{nl}May the goddesses protect you in your journey..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002228
text: You haven't seen the people wander around this forest?{nl}Even after what the lord told us{nl}when the monsters intruded into our village, we all scattered to survive.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002229
text: {nl}It is now time for everyone to come by now, but I think they lost their way in the forest.{nl}I am sorry, but can you light up the bonfire at the 3rd district to help the ones who lost their ways in the forest?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002230
text: I've met some people here. {nl}No one saw the elder.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002231
text: Thank you so much!{nl}The people who you've guided through the bonfire are resting at the safe area.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002232
text: I am counting the number of people and it seems that not even half of them has arrived here.{nl}Lots of people are still wandering the forest.{nl}I think I should make a smoke with a bigger bonfire.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002233
text: {nl}For the settlers at the 4th district, I want you to light up the fire on the woods which Lutas prepared.{nl}With that, you would be able to see through the leaves.{nl}I am counting on you!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002234
text: According to what Lutas told us, we can't just let in lots of settlers into Orsha{nl}so we've set up various small camps around the outer wall of Orsha and supporting the settlers.{nl}The bonfires which you've lit up are to support the settlers.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002235
text: There was a big disturbance. You are not hurt anywhere?{nl}I am sorry that I've put you in this mess.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002236
text: {nl}This is so horrible. Those gigantic monsters are wandering in the forest.{nl}We have nothing that we can do to the settlers in the forest..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002237
text: I haven't seen you before. Are you the officer in Orsha?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002238
text: {nl}Ah.. damn. I've made a big mistake.{nl}I am called Ibanayu from the southern coast.{nl}I heard that there are lots of supplies and we will be protected safely here so I've ran here without sleeping while leaving the village in the south..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002239
text: {nl}As you can see, what's prepared for us is the bonfire and a few lumps of grass.{nl}Also we don't have enough officers who would protect us..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002240
text: {nl}{nl}What we can do is that we can pick up the goods which the natives had used and left and use them to obtain the food.{nl}Can you collect those from the 5th district?{nl}I heard that if we leave this place, the monsters would go crazy so people like us can't walk around.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002241
text: The south coast also received some damages.{nl}The fruits that came down from the river at the north destroyed all the fishing nets{nl}and due to the fruit juice that spurted out from the fruits, I've just kept seeing the sea which turned colorful.{nl}At least, the south was okay since there were no monsters there..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002242
text: I will use them well. Since people are still coming up from the two villages at the southern coast,{nl}I will pass the story about you well if I meet the lord.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002243
text: You look very different to be called as a settler...{nl}The people around Orsha do not wear clothes like that.{nl}Are you a traveler?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002244
text: {nl}If that's so, why don't you pray in front of the Statue of Goddess Zemyna at the 6th district?{nl}Goddess Zemyna controls the land and she also takes care of the travel roads of the travelers.{nl}But, the goddess is not responding to our prayer from sometime.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002245
text: I don't know who has set up so many statues of the goddess.{nl}But, as I hear it, it's very old.{nl}So they either break up or become monsters' habitats...{nl}and there are also cases of monsters going into the Goddess Statue.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002246
text: {nl}Of course, you don't have to believe it...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002247
text: Have you been to 7th district? The elder asked us to meet at the 7th district when we arrive at Lemprasa Pond, but we can't go due to the monsters...{nl}In order to prevent it from getting stolen from the settlers, we should go there first.{nl}But, I can't do that with my skills.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002248
text: {nl}If monsters appear around there, can you please defeat them?{nl}When the elder come, I will tell him about you for sure.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002249
text: Due to the order to move out, I abandoned my house and blamed a lot{nl}After I heard about the situation at the north, I stopped thinking about that.{nl}I hope the village would be safe until the order gets lifted.{nl}The elders left here since they said they can't leave the village.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002250
text: How can they ask us to gather at the place where monsters are going crazy... {nl}The lord is asking us for too much.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002251
text: After the order to move out, we didn't move with the villagers.{nl}I think the people who have left before us would probably be at the 8th district by now.{nl}Can you bring those people back here?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002252
text: {nl}Even if we group together with the people of Romanas Elder,{nl}this place seems safer than the 8th district...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002253
text: I know that this place has been prepared for us, but I didn't expect it to be this dangerous...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002254
text: Thank you. I should ask Romanas before our elder comes here that{nl}if I can be here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002255
text: I've heard a lot that a mysterious man is helping my people.{nl}I heard that he is a person who receives lots of respect from others.{nl}It is well known that he helped them while the kingdom and the lord didn't do anything.{nl}He is like a hero sent by the goddesses.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002256
text: {nl}I have a request for a hero like him.{nl}In Orsha, our residents have someone{nl}whom they rely on spiritually more than the lord.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002257
text: {nl}Urbonas is someone who we all need to recover Orsha which was torn in pieces.{nl}But, lately, I can't see him.{nl}He disappeared with his priests without any words.{nl}My agents are looking for the whereabouts of Urbonas.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002258
text: {nl}I want to request to help finding the whereabouts of Urbonas.{nl}Without anybody knowing...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002259
text: A big chaos would result if the residents find out about this.{nl}The order to move out came down late already and various villages were attacked by the monsters.{nl}If they find out that Urbonas disappeared, it would be hard to control Orsha.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002260
text: Lately, one of his disciples, Pranas came back.{nl}To listen for more details, I talked with him, but Pranas also doesn't know why.{nl}He is busy looking for whereabouts of Urbonas.{nl}My subordinates and the hired chasers are searching the Woods of the Linked Bridges and Paupys Crossing.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002261
text: {nl}But, there is no more progress due to the outrageous monsters.{nl}We need your help.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002262
text: We must look for Urbonas.{nl}In this world, where even the goddesses do not answer, the only one we can rely on is Urbonas.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002263
text: Urbonas is cooperating with my family.{nl}Recently, there are reports that demons are appearing from the Woods of the Linked Bridges and Paupys Crossing.{nl}I can't tell you for sure, but I don't have a good feeling on this.{nl}For Orsha and its residents, can you look for the whereabouts of Urbonas?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002264
text: Thanks for helping us.{nl}Please visit the Goddess Statue before you leave.{nl}The Goddess Statues will be a guide that will be needed in your journeys.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002265
text: {nl}And although not big, I've told the item merchant so you can receive some goods from the merchant.{nl}May the luck with you on your journey.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002266
text: You should never tell the residents that the bishop has disappeared.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002267
text: I've heard from the bishop.{nl}You are telling others that you are the hero sent by the goddesses while helping the residents outside right?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002268
text: {nl}Please receive these goods!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002269
text: After the capital city has been destroyed, there are not many intact cities in this kingdom.{nl}Either Klaipeda or Fedimian...{nl}If you need any potions or tools in the future, you will meet me often.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002270
text: {nl}And it seems that the lord has requested something to the Accessory Merchant,{nl}so you better meet the merchant.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002271
text: Travelers are coming to Orsha since it is relatively safe.{nl}The world has collapsed, but I am making more money than before..{nl}Isn't it ironic?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002272
text: Hello! I really wanted to meet you.{nl}I've hard that you saved my friends.{nl}I haven't prepared a lot, but since the bishop also told me, I will give you this!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002273
text: {nl}{nl}And it seems that the bishop is looking for you.{nl}Please hurry!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002274
text: Are you ready to leave? I've received a message from the agent that was searching at the Woods of the Linked Bridges.{nl}It seems that he found some clues about the whereabouts of the bishop and his company.{nl}If you are ready, meet with Cherasia at the Woods Linked Bridges.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002275
text: You seem to be the one who the elder was talking about.{nl}Nice to meet you. I am Cherasia.{nl}I am looking for whereabouts of Urbonas and the priests here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002276
text: I've told the residents that the agents were dispatched outside to protect the areas so I want you to also act as if you don't know anything so that the efforts of the agents do not end in vain.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002277
text: The search activities didn't end in vain.{nl}I am sure that you must have heard about Pranas from the elder.{nl}Pranas, the guy who had gone for trainings in the northern area and came back recently.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002278
text: {nl}We've found some traces of the Priest Irma who is one of the disciples of the bishop here.{nl}And from the traces that were discovered, the memo that looked beloging to Iruma was ripped in pieces.{nl}When you look at the shape how it was ripped off, it seems that the monsters bit them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002279
text: {nl}That's why I've caught the monsters and retrieving the pages of the memo...{nl}But, that's too much work for me.{nl}Can you defeat the monsters at the 1st district and get me the pages of the Priest Irma?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002280
text: Pranas has left first to look for the traces of Urbonas with other officers.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002281
text: It has been stained due to the body fluid of the monsters so its hard to recognize it, but{nl}As I read it, it's about being chansed by something.{nl}We better hurry up.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002282
text: {nl}Take this and meet Pranas at the northen region.{nl}I will look for the other traces here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002283
text: I am an agent, Moren.{nl}So you are the one who the bishop talked about.{nl}If Iruma is being chased after, that means the bishop is also being chased after right?{nl}I am looking for the place where the bishop and his company stayed.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002284
text: {nl}Due to the monsters nearby, I can't investigate exactly.{nl}While I am checking the bonfire here, can you defeat the monsters that are disturbing us around here?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002285
text: The investigation has not been done yet.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002286
text: You found a sheet of paper that looks blackened by something.{nl}So this is the memo.. How come they burnt it like this?{nl}It seems that the travelers here didn't do this.{nl}Someone extinguished the bonfire and covered it with the lump of grass...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002287
text: {nl}What if it catches the fire...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002288
text: You told me that the Priest Irma is being chased after by something right?{nl}Then, this blackened paper is to hide something from the chasers.{nl}No matter what the reason is, we need to collect these.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002289
text: {nl}As I am looking at the memo here, please look through the lumps of grass that have smoke on them{nl}and collect the memos that are half burnt.{nl}If you could collect them, I will analyze them for you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002290
text: I am sure that they didn't light them up since they were being chased after...{nl}Are they lit up to deceive someone?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002291
text: Good. Let's analyze them now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002292
text: {nl}Folklore...{nl}The Hamondale family...{nl}The Revelator...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002293
text: {nl}The Revelator? what is the Revelator doing anyways?{nl}We better go meet Pranas fast.{nl}Please go to the northern area.{nl}I will continue the rest of the search here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002294
text: You are looking for Pranas? Pranas has left to Paupys Crossing.{nl}He told me to look for the traces of the priests from the 5th district.{nl}There is some camp located there, but there are so many monsters which I can't face alone.{nl}I tried to defeat some of them, but since they all rushed into me after that, it is so hard for me to go there again.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002295
text: {nl}{nl}If you are okay, can you search the 5th district?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002296
text: If what Moren is thinking is true, that means this place is full of monsters by now.{nl}Do you believe the Revelator really exists even when the goddesses disappeared?{nl}I don't think so.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002297
text: {nl}The agents have too many worries.{nl}Orsha is very far away from the place where demons are appearing...{nl}Don't worry.{nl}The bishop must have went somewhere since he is bored.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002298
text: Contents of Urbonas' journal (metaphorical content){nl}- A turbulent era was approaching and it was time to face the destiny our order had been preparing for centuries.{nl}- I can only hope Orsha remains safe until my priests and I can complete this task.{nl}- That sent by the goddesses... (end of content)

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002299
text: I've seen the flame roaring to the sky. Are you saying the demons really appeared?{nl}What's wrong with the diary of the bishop? It's too confusing.{nl}We better go back to Pranas.{nl}Go back to Paupys Crossing at the north!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002300
text: I think he's almost here by now.{nl}I've heard about it from the agent of the lord.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002301
text: I should have just stayed in my hometown and live by hunting.{nl}Demons!{nl}My mother would faint out if she finds out that I am chasing after demons.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002302
text: I am helping the agents here so they can carry out their duties.{nl}If you get a chance to go to the 1st district, I want you to defeat the monsters there,{nl}so that the activities of the officers there would not get disturbed.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002303
text: I was actually working here for a different mission.{nl}Recently, many problems occurred including the disappearance of the priests,{nl}so my task to find out why the monsters were heading to Orsha got delayed.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002304
text: We want monsters not to group together.{nl}Thanks.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002305
text: Recently, the monsters are coming near Orsha.{nl}So to find out what happened to them,{nl}they put all the monsters into a wagon and put them at the 2nd district.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002306
text: {nl}But, due to another matter, the wagon was abandoned and it is spreading the bad odor.{nl}Because of that, the monsters are going even more crazy.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002307
text: One of the principles of the agents is that they check it with their hands and their tongues.{nl}That's why we know a lot of poison water and monsters.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002308
text: The monsters don't usually rush into the place where the fire started so we don't have to worry about this place.{nl}Thank you for helping me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002309
text: Lots of chasers came to hometown after getting hired.{nl}I never thought Orsha would be big like this.{nl}So I've brought a funny good from my hometown.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002310
text: {nl}Do you want to use this monster stimulant?{nl}It seems that you are receiving requests from lots of people,{nl}so if you use this, you would be able to do some of those tasks easier.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002311
text: When you sprinkle this monster stimulant to the monsters, the monsters may attack my allies,{nl}but, if there are no allies around, they may attack humans.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002312
text: How was it? If the effects are good, I should make some of them and sell them at Orsha.{nl}I've worked as a merchant before the world turned out like this so I know what's worth of making money.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002313
text: The agents have left for the another task so they want me to do the investigation on their behalf.{nl}They want me to investigate the Woods of the Linked Bridges.{nl}I think they are trying to hide the refugees from the north around here..{nl}I guess they don't have enough force.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002314
text: According to what the agent told me who handed over the task to me, the most suspicious area is the 5th district.{nl}It seems that they also handed over some task to you.. if you are going to the 5th district, can you get rid of the monsters and their habitats?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002315
text: I am getting paid for doing this... Why are you doing this for?{nl}Well... if you want to just have some experiences, I guess that's not that bad after all..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002316
text: Damn... the monsters set up their nests in this normal looking forest too...{nl}This is... difficult...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002317
text: Pranas has left to the northern region with other agents first.{nl}I am looking for the traces of the Priest, Gelliya who was discovered here.{nl}But, its so hard for me to search here due to the attributes of the monsters since they are different from the ones in our hometown.{nl}Can you help me getting the pages of Gelliya's memo by defeating the monsters?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002318
text: {nl}This memo should possess some decisive evidence.{nl}The traces that are being left by the ones who run away since they want others to find them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002319
text: I was not going to think too much about the safety of Orsha if I can continue to get paid.. {nl}But, after seeing the demons that are appearing here, I remember my hometown.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002320
text: Thanks. Because it is ripped in pieces, I can't check exactly what's written..{nl}It seems that a few disciples went missing while running away.{nl}It is written that the disciples of the bishop are feeling uneasy.{nl}More than anything, it seems that the demons were hiding various places in the forest and they were going after them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002321
text: We better let Pranas know about it. Go to the 3rd district.{nl}While going there, please also stop by at the camp in the 2nd district and check whether there are other traces.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002322
text: If he went missing at the place where the demons are located..{nl}It is so unfortunate, but you won't see those priests again..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002323
text: So you are the one who the lord talked about. I am telling about you to the agents here.{nl}I was actually going to see Pranas, but I was taking a rest since Jali got too tired.{nl}It seems that Jali got too excited since there is some place here where the bishop and his company used to stay.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002324
text: {nl}Jali was the dog that was being raised by Urbonas.{nl}I thought I would find it quicker if I use the olfactory sense of Jali.{nl}If you are looking for the bishop's company, why don't you take Jali with you?{nl}For Pranas, he would need even slightest clues.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002325
text: I hope there's a dog like Jali at the agents' camp as well.{nl}It is cute, it follows people's orders well and most of all, it searches really well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002326
text: Did Jali find something?{nl}It is certain that there were lots of people around here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002327
text: I am worried because I heard some screaming sound from the north side of the trails.{nl}Can you first go to the 8th district?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002328
text: If I find Pranas, I would have to go back to Orsha and be prepared.{nl}Agents usually spend the time by wandering around...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002329
text: What are you doing here, Run away!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002330
text: What? You've come here to look for Pranas?{nl}Then, we are too late. Pranas was attacked by the demons at the 5th district.{nl}I should've brought the agents.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002331
text: {nl}When I met his eyes, all we can do was to run away.{nl}Pranas will be in danger if it continues like this!{nl}Help us!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002332
text: There's nothing we can do.{nl}If Pranas gets attacked, the bishop's disappearance will go into mystery forever...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002333
text: Damn..{nl}Who are you? You've saved me.{nl}One or two demons were wandering around so I was going to search the camp, but{nl}the boss suddenly appeared..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002334
text: So the elder sent you?{nl}Then you must know that the bishop has already disappeared..{nl}I can't even control myself so it's hard for me to continue the search activities.{nl}Can you look around here on behalf of me?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002335
text: {nl}If this place doesn't exist, we may have to go to the forest in the north that turned into a ruin.{nl}I am worried since there are more dangerous monsters out there..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002336
text: If you find something, please come look for me at Orsha.{nl}I am counting on you..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002337
text: I took some rest and as a result, I got better.{nl}Have you found something?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002338
text: With the agents, I am helping the chasers who were hired to search Paupys Crossing and do the investigation.{nl}But, it's too hard for me to do it alone.{nl}If you get a chance to cross the 1st district, please tell me after defeating the monsters there.{nl}Then, I will pass your good intentions to the elder.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002339
text: I was called here during my vacation so I don't know what's going on.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002340
text: You've defeated that many?{nl}Are the ones from the outside all strong like you?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002341
text: I haven't found out exactly why the demons are wandering around here, but..{nl}there are many magic circles wihch the demons have set up at the 2nd district.{nl}If you get a chance to visit the 2nd district, can you get rid of those?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002342
text: When I came here last time due to the problem of the settlers.. there were nothing like this..{nl}What's going on?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002343
text: I don't understand why they set this up.{nl}It doesn't seem to have any damages.. It is stragne.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002344
text: The villagers in the north would start to emigrate soon.{nl}The lord is thinking about making them stay near the 4th district.{nl}The villagers in the north are aggressive and there are elders who were once mercenaries so if there is a camp for them{nl}they think they can protect themselves.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002345
text: {nl}So they told me to check whether those monsters are the ones we can handle ourselves{nl}I am a person who actually write documents and putting stamps on the documents instead of doing investigations so this is too much task for me.{nl}I heard that you are very strong. Can you check 4/5 districts?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002346
text: I never held a sword except for when I joind the squad so I don't understand why they are sending us to this kind of place..{nl}The lord is asking too much.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002347
text: Are you saying that a gigantic monster appeared at the camp?{nl}I haven't seen with my own eyes, but I can't tell others to stay theree.{nl}You agree right? I will count on you and report.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002348
text: We are facing a difficult situation.{nl}The demons which I saw in the books may appear at the place where I was dispatched..{nl}This is too much for me.{nl}And due to the demons that I haven't seen, the monsters may have gone violent..{nl}How can they ask me to extract the blood from the monsters...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002349
text: If you get a chance to visit 5th district, could you defeat the monsters there and collect their blood?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002350
text: I am not a coward.{nl}I just know my place.{nl}I don't fight with a sword or a spear, but rather with pens and stamps..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002351
text: What is this disgusting odor?{nl}I don't know why he ordered me to collect these.{nl}He knows well..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002352
text: It's too hard for me to survive by just hunting these days so I came down this far.{nl}We should live on.{nl}In this place, we won't survive even if we have more than 10 lives.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002353
text: {nl}We were injured and we don't know when the monsters and the demons would go after us.{nl}While we are recovering, can you defeat the monsters around?{nl}Since we don't have any one who is okay, I have no one to request other than you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002354
text: I want to swear to the ones who took me here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002355
text: I think I have some problem on my legs or ankles.{nl}If you didn't help me, I am sure that I would have been attacked.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002356
text: Have you seen any bags or luggages around here?{nl}While we were away, the monsters took the goods of the chasers and the agents{nl}and ran away.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002357
text: {nl}If you get a chance to go to 8th district, can you look for our luggages?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002358
text: I am hurt and lost my luggages..{nl}Before you asked me to help me, I didn't have any excuses so I didn't know what to do.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002359
text: Thank you so much! Althugh I haven't retrived them all, I think I now have something to say!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002360
text: I can now barely manage ourselves.{nl}This is all because of your help.{nl}Although I am not good, I translated the diary of the bishop so do you want to listen to it?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002361
text: When I translate the diary of the bishop, I can read something like this.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002362
text: {nl}{nl}If the world goes into a chaos, an outsider who was assigned by the goddesses would visit Orsha.{nl}But, that outsider would come in with other outsiders.{nl}It is our destiny to find and guide him.{nl}Among many outsiders, we should look for the one who we are looking for.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002363
text: {nl}Before we are even ready, the demons are chasing after the right.{nl}I am heading to the Ashaq Underground Prison with my priests.{nl}There, I will wait for the Revelator.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002364
text: {nl}{nl}We didn't have enough time to pass it to Inessa and the priests who went outside.{nl}If someone discovers this diary, please hand it over to Inesa Hamondale.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002365
text: {nl}{nl}I understand now.{nl}Being chased after the demons! That's a big problem.{nl}We better let the lord know this!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002366
text: Urbonas was being chased after the demons!{nl}Ashaq Underground Prison was closed for a long time.{nl}I don't know what they are trying to do..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002367
text: {nl}Someone must go there now!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002368
text: I will get ready to go to Ashaq Underground Prison.{nl}I want you to tell this to the lord fast!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002369
text: It would take long time to send my subordinates there.{nl}I am sorry, but can you go to Ashaq Underground Prison where Pranas and Urbonas are located?{nl}I can't move so I feel stuffy..

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002370
text: If you are the Revelator which Urbonas talked about, we better go meet Urbonas fast.{nl}However, even if you are busy, you should be well prepared so go meet the item merchant.{nl}I've prepared goods which you would be able to use well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002371
text: {nl}If your preparation gets completed, don't come to me, but please rather meet Pranas and head to Ashaq Underground Prison!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002372
text: I've prepared it fast since the lord sent the people.{nl}I should give you a better good, but since we are in a hurry, please use it.{nl}When you use an anvil, you would be able to enhance your weapon.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002373
text: If the demons hurt Urbonas, then the next target will be Orsha.{nl}We should do our best to save Urbonas!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002374
text: Your words are correct.{nl}The northern region where I used to stay became a ruin due to the demons.{nl}Probably, the next location will be the southern region.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002375
text: {nl}Orsha is the base of the southern part of the kingdom.{nl}I am sure that the demons would do something.{nl}Please go to Ashaq Underground Prison with me to save Urbonas!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002376
text: I am gonna go to ask for help to the chasers.{nl}If you are ready, please come to xx region that leads to Ashaq Underground Prison at Paupys Crossing.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002377
text: They are all experienced chasers who would help me.{nl}But, it's not going to enough do it just by us.{nl}It is so fortunate that you came with us.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002378
text: I can feel some ominous energy coming from the direction of the Underground Prison.{nl}If you are ready, let's head to Ashaq Underground Prison.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002379
text: I will first leave with the chasers.{nl}Please follow us right away.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002380
text: It feels like something unknown is suffocating me.{nl}I can't even breathe.{nl}By the way, are you okay?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002381
text: {nl}By seeing that you are free inside, I guess the goddesses really take care of you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002382
text: I've been to this place a few times when I was doing training in the past.{nl}But, I never felt like something is suffocating me.{nl}Same with that ominous fog.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002383
text: {nl}Since you seem safe, can you go to the 2nd district and{nl}check what's going on?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002384
text: This feeling is like a curse.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002385
text: I've never seen an icon with a shape like that.{nl}I think the demons have some other objective.{nl}I can't do anything at the moment so I am very grateful{nl}that you've destroyed the icon for me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002386
text: {nl}There is a possibility that the bishop and his brothers are hiding in the hidden room.{nl}Since we can't do anything, you should go there alone.{nl}Are you going to be okay?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002387
text: If possible, I want you to eliminate all the icons.{nl}If they remain, we can't run away even if our brothers are alive.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002388
text: This place is old and mazed so if we go into a wrong way, we may not be able to go up.{nl}Please be careful.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002389
text: So you've come here with Pranas?{nl}You've entered into a deadly place in order to save me.. I am too sorry to see my dead disciples.{nl}Recently, when my disciple, Iruma was doing training, he found a sheet of order.{nl}It contained the plans of the demons to annihilate Orsha.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002390
text: {nl}I gathered my disciples and met with Irma to try and analyze the document.{nl}But since then we've been constantly under attack by the demons.{nl}The document says that Demon Goddess Giltine is trying to kill all Revelators. {nl}So our order came here to hide and prepare to meet and guide the destined Revelator.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002391
text: {nl}{nl}We had no way of telling Lord Inesa, however.{nl}If we left any traces the demons would find us and we thought that would be the end of us.{nl}My disciples and I ended up hiding here, trying to avoid the demons.{nl}But there was something we missed.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002392
text: {nl}We were being chased by no ordinary demon, but a Demon Lord.{nl}This Demon Lord, Marnox, set up statues of himself to control the prison{nl} and had his vassals close in on us to keep us from escaping.{nl}We thought soon it would be over for us.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002393
text: {nl}The priests are hiding in levels 2F and 3F.{nl}A few priests went missing, and Irma and I met Marnox trying to escape from the hidden room where we hid the Demon Orders.{nl}Irma was caught by Marnox, while I managed to escape and was ready to die by now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002394
text: {nl}But if Inesa sent you here, there is still hope.{nl}There is no doubt you are the Revelator we have been waiting for.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002395
text: If you are a Revelator, step onto our magic circle.{nl}If your status is confirmed, then you can face the Demon Lord.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002396
text: Don't be afraid.{nl}The goddesses will lead your way.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002397
text: The efforts of our order were not in vain.{nl}Revelator...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002398
text: {nl}Only you can face Demon Lord Marnox now.{nl}Please, save our priests and the people of Orsha.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002399
text: Revelator, thanks to you destroying the statues Pranas is now able to move.{nl}I'm old and will be nothing but a burden to you; go with Pranas and Irma and save the priests.{nl}Please.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002400
text: I can't escape on my own and leave the priests behind.{nl}We need to find the Demon Orders. {nl}We need to analyze it and figure out the demons' invasion plans.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002401
text: The bishop is alive!{nl}I'm so glad to hear that.{nl}And you really are a Revelator.{nl}The goddesses are on our side.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002402
text: There's a sinister energy hanging over this place.{nl}Still, I want to be useful to our employer...{nl}I know you must be busy, but if you're headed to region 1, will you{nl}defeat some demons there and get something for me?{nl}Something safe.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002403
text: You seem to be in better condition than us.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002404
text: I don't know what they'll do with this but at least it won't look like I'm slacking off on the job.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002405
text: All the agents outside asked me to get something for them.{nl}Honestly I have no interest in these things...{nl}But since they asked I guess I'll have to do it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002406
text: {nl}I'm going to look for what I can; if you happen to face some demons in region 2{nl}will you get something from them, too?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002407
text: Isn't it better to capture the demons instead, though?{nl}That is, assuming you can catch them, of course.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002408
text: A wooden piece.{nl}Is it an amulet? I wonder what they can do with this...{nl}Well, it's better than nothing.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002409
text: I hear from the agents that the demons have a kind of sack they carry around with them.{nl}I wonder if these sacks don't have something to do with how they can live in these terrible conditions.{nl}If you go to region 3, get some after you defeat the demons and try and use the sacks.{nl}Who knows, they could be useful for yourself, too.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002410
text: I came to help with the maintenance work but look at what almost happened.{nl}You really can't trust anyone outside the church.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002411
text: This could be very useful.{nl}I ought to show it to the agents as soon as I get outside.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002412
text: So the brothers are all hiding in the level below.{nl}Let's go, then.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002413
text: If Draznie and Auranas are safe, that means the other brothers can still be alive.{nl}But it's the same thing here.{nl}There's cursed idols everywhere.{nl}We really need to get rid of them as soon as we can...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002414
text: According to Draznie, there's a cursed totem in region 2.{nl}Will you take it down?{nl}It will be easier to look for Irma in region 3 after that.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002415
text: The bishop is very fond of Irma.{nl}She needs to be alive...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002416
text: You destroyed the statue?{nl}It's such a relief to hear that.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002417
text: Now please look for traces of Irma in region 3.{nl}Let us hope she's still alive...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002418
text: Revelator, you are the only one our order can depend on.{nl}The same goes for the Lord and the residents of Orsha.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002419
text: What happened...?{nl}I thought the Demon Lord had killed me...{nl}Where are we?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002420
text: So the statues were the reason why we couldn't move.{nl}I saw them in regions 4 and 5 when the bishop and I were trying to avoid the Demon Lord.{nl}The ones I saw looked a little different, but it seems like Marnox set them up to spy on us.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002421
text: {nl}Will you take down the statues in regions 4 and 5?{nl}If we don't, no matter where we go we will never escape from Marnox's grip...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002422
text: Before I was caught by the Demon Lord, the bishop told me all about the fate of our order.{nl}Revelator, I am truly glad to have met you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002423
text: Irma went down to the third floor.{nl}She told me to send you there when you came back.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002424
text: {nl}I don't think I can move from here.{nl}I'm afraid you'll have to go on your own.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002425
text: Irma said she was going to the third floor to find Gelija.{nl}She's Irma's sister so I couldn't even try to stop her.{nl}She knows we can't do anything without you here,{nl}I don't know why she's acting like this.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002426
text: {nl}Find Irma before the Demon Lord finds her again.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002427
text: Irma told me.{nl}That you came all the way here from Orsha to find us.{nl}I'm not afraid now that I know a Revelator is with us.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002428
text: Irma is too reckless and that's a problem.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002429
text: The bishop was very worried.{nl}There were of course many places to meet with a Revelator other than here.{nl}Draznie and I were in charge of this prison so we made a lot of preparations for a future crisis here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002430
text: {nl}Originally we simply planned to avoid any difficult enemies, but since you're here{nl}we should make use of our hidden tools.{nl}I left some bags of pearl powder in region 1.{nl}If you collect this powder we can use it against the demons.{nl}I'll tell you how after you bring back the powder.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002431
text: Once again I'm in awe with our bishop's sense of foresight.{nl}If he hadn't prepared this we would have been left at the hands of the demons.{nl}I hope the missing brothers are at the other hideouts we prepared.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002432
text: This is more than enough.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002433
text: The demons aren't simple monsters; they seem to have a command hierarchy.{nl}The stronger ones commanding the weaker ones.{nl}I wonder if defeating the strong ones won't make it easier to take down the rest.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002434
text: {nl}Take this pearl powder and use it whenever you see a demon.{nl}The light coming from the power will point to the strongest demon monsters so you can tell who they are.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002435
text: We still don't know if someone's leading the demons{nl}but if we take them down one by one won't the world become safe again?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002436
text: Thank you.{nl}Did you deal well with the demons?{nl}There are many other things prepared but this is all I have...{nl}Draznie will have to take care of the rest.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002437
text: Auranas and I found several safe spots around this prison.{nl}Of course the one where we are now is not one of them.{nl}I was hiding in region 3 but the Demon Lord came with his vassals to look around the area.{nl}I had to leave all my things behind and escape.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002438
text: {nl}We should find that spot again if we're going to stay here a little longer...{nl}But as you can see all we can do is run.{nl}If that's fine with you, will you clear out region 3?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002439
text: I guess the demons didn't expect us to be hiding there...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002440
text: {nl}The problem is we didn't expect them to go all the way there either.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002441
text: Thank you.{nl}I should have a look around and hide in region 3 again.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002442
text: In region 4 there are several small rooms.{nl}I made traps in them with the technique I learned while working in the northern region. {nl}The have an image of me to lure the enemy.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002443
text: {nl}But I can't go all the way there.{nl}If it's fine with you, will you go there and activate the traps?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002444
text: I have several other traps and hideouts outside this prison.{nl}I prepared enough for everyone in case something happens to Orsha.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002445
text: Did it work well on the demons?{nl}I had never used it on demons before, so I was worried.{nl}But I'm glad to hear it went well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002446
text: Go see Irma now.{nl}She's preparing to take back the Demon Orders.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002447
text: I'm sorry for disappearing without notice.{nl}It was urgent. While you were destroying the surveillance statue{nl}I managed to escape without Marnox noticing.{nl}But it seems he has more statues here, too.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002448
text: Many brothers were sacrificed to reach where we are.{nl}Because this is the only path we can take.{nl}Please, stop the demons.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002449
text: To enter the hidden room and get the orders, you'll have to destroy the statue in region 2. {nl}But remember not to use a transport device in its range or Marnox will catch you.{nl}Can you do it?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002450
text: This is strange, he should be here any minute now...{nl}Are you afraid?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002451
text: This is very strange.{nl}Why isn't Marnox here?{nl}From his behaviour so far, I would assume he'd come...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002452
text: If Marnox doesn't come, there's nothing we can do.{nl}Just in case, I think it would be good to destroy the statue in region 3 to provoke him.{nl}As long as he lives we will never be able to open the door to the hidden room.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002453
text: The bishop can't have been found, can he? {nl}I remember he acted so brazen when he had me caught, nothing like now.{nl}I remember how lowly he regarded priests like me...{nl}Revelator, are you afraid?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002454
text: He might have sent his vassals and escaped, he could be making other plans.{nl}We can't waste any more time, let's open the door.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002455
text: I'll open the door and you'll enter the room. {nl}Let's get the orders and go back to the bishop immediately.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002456
text: You defeated Marnox...{nl}I don't think I will be able to move for a while.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002457
text: It was an honor defending the fate of our order until the end.{nl}It was all thanks to you.{nl}I'm going to hide here and recover, you take the orders and go see the bishop.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002458
text: Do you mean you defeated Marnox?{nl}A Demon Lord... You truly have the power of a Revelator.{nl}I'm glad the priests are safe...{nl}I will talk to Inesa and make sure those who are missing return to their homes.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002459
text: People will remember you when Orsha prospers once again...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002460
text: I'm going to return to Orsha and work on the Demon Orders analysis.{nl}You go see the Lord and tell her about Marnox and us.{nl}My disciples are staying here to make sure there's no traces of Marnox left and to find the missing priests.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002461
text: So the demons reached the areas surrounding Orsha.{nl}We were always wary of demon invasions, but we never thought we'd have to face a Demon Lord.{nl}If only I could praise your feat to the people...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002462
text: {nl}I'm sorry. If I told everyone about it, it would only scare the residents.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002463
text: I heard about what happened.{nl}Urbonas confirmed you are a Revelator sent by the goddesses.{nl}It is an honor to meet the hero of the legend passed down in our family.{nl}It seems the goddesses haven't left us yet.{nl}What are your plans now?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002464
text: {nl}For now, you should go see Urbonas.{nl}He's looking for you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002465
text: Please think of Orsha as your second home.{nl}I and the residents of Orsha are always glad to welcome you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002466
text: Welcome. We were just finishing the analysis. {nl}There's a few parts here and there we can't agree on, but here's what we have.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002467
text: {nl}{nl}(Demon Orders analysis)

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002468
text: We mustn't assume all the missing brothers are dead.{nl}But to find them we need to destroy Marnox's statues.{nl}Would you take care of that?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002469
text: Someone has to be alive...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002470
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll go find them as soon as I recover from my injuries.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002471
text: There's no way to know where the brothers are hiding in this prison...{nl}And there'll be priests that won't be able to return to their families even after all of this is over...{nl}I wish I could bring them their belongings at least.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002472
text: {nl}Several priests went missing in region 2.{nl}Will you look for their bags there?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002473
text: Not all of the bags will belong to missing people.{nl}I lost mine too, after all...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002474
text: Thank you. You found my bag that was lost, too.{nl}Seeing the diaries inside the bags makes me think many of the brothers are still alive. {nl}We need to find them before it's too late.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002475
text: There's a reason you cover your hands when you throw away something dirty.{nl}Priest Irma destroyed Marnox's cursed idols when she was running away from him.{nl}But now their remains are spread aroun all overd.{nl}Their energy could still come back and hurt us.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002476
text: {nl}Here's a cloth soaked in holy water. Use it to get rid of what remains of the statue.{nl}Cover the fragments with the cloth and the power of the holy water will make them disappear.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002477
text: Rushing anything is bound to end in trouble eventually.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002478
text: That's one less thing to worry about. {nl}Although, with how the demons left this place, it's going be a while before it can be back to normal.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002479
text: Would you go to the Uzali Crossroads and hunt some Green Lepusbunny Assassins?{nl}We could use their warm fur.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002480
text: Around here there are Blue Siaulav Mages that carry emergency food.{nl}Horace probably told you their food is surprisingly edible. Could you get some for me?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002481
text: It's funny, if it weren't for them I would have starved by now.{nl}Because of the cold, the only thing that grows around here are potatoes.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002482
text: First we need to do something about the heat.{nl}Horace once said that Blue Lapasape mushrooms generate heat; I want to test them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002483
text: Let's see if you're skilled, then.{nl}Go to Paupys Crossing and take down ten Lapflammers and ten Lapemans.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002484
text: You seem strong enough already.{nl}I just need to check how well you're able to use that strength of yours.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002485
text: Good. You have fulfilled the most basic condition.{nl}Us Peltasta are a class that uses the shield actively against our opponents. {nl)As such, you're required to have a basic understanding of it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002486
text: I'm going to ask you for some materials for your shield.{nl}First you can go to Paupys Crossing and collect metal decorations from Lapemans.{nl}Also, gather some dry wood from an isolated worshop there.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002487
text: You did well.{nl}Now gather all the materials you need and craft your own shield.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002488
text: I'm simply following the Master's important orders.{nl}That doesn't mean I'm jealous of you for being a traveler!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002489
text: Of course, first you'll have to prove you can handle advanced techniques.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002490
text: Take this and defeat the monsters in Bracken Forest 63_3.{nl}You'll see the numbers here go up the more enemies you defeat.{nl}Demons are worth twice the points.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002491
text: There are a few conditions, though.{nl}One, you must defeat the enemy with a shield equipped. {nl}Two, if you become incapable of combat, the enemies you defeated until then will not count.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002492
text: {nl}Finally, you have to defeat the monsters without any help from your allies.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002493
text: Defeat monsters with your shield equipped. {nl}This will prove your survival skills.{nl}Note that catching demons will be more effective.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002494
text: Teaching you how to use the spear is easy, what's important is your attitude.{nl}There's a place that's just right for learners like you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002495
text: The most important virtue of a warrior is their sense of combat.{nl}That means attacking anything that's hostile to what you're trying to protect.{nl}Give it a try; defeat the Yognomes in Bracken Forest 63_3.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002496
text: Did you hear?{nl}Some of the refugees that were coming to Orsha got hurt around the Lemprasa Pond and were left behind.{nl}They need to be rescued!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002497
text: I'm glad nothing worse happened to them.{nl}It was all thanks to your help.{nl}I think it's clear you're ready to move on to the final level of Cleric.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002498
text: The first herbs you will find in the XXX region under piles of leaves.{nl}The second herbs grow in the YY region.{nl}The third are blooming yellow flowers in region ZZ; they should be the easiest to find.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002499
text: The master herself, too, got in after making her own Bokor doll.{nl}I guess you can say it's part of our history and tradition.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002500
text: I would say this is a very high quality Bokor doll!{nl}It really seems like you're a natural. {nl}Now you too are a Bokor. Welcome!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002501
text: What is it?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002502
text: Oh... if you mean a strong-willed Dievdirbys, yes, I know her.{nl}But I'm afraid I'm at a loss here. I have no chisel or any materials to make one.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002503
text: Alright. Then prove you're ready to learn some advanced techniques.{nl}Show me how much you've mastered the basics.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002504
text: Any monster is fine, as long as you use your Highlander techniques to defeat them.{nl}Do this without the help of your colleagues.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002505
text: Looks like you have no problems in defeating demons.{nl}But you still need some practice for the more vicious ones.{nl}I can show you the way of a true Peltasta.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002506
text: If you meet the requirements, that is.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002507
text: I once was asked to get rid of the Chapparition in Karolis Springs.{nl}I couldn't finish the job at the time but now I think it could be a good test for you.{nl}Go to Karolis Springs and defeat the Chapparition there.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002508
text: I'm surprised by how much you improved.{nl}I can tell you're different from other Hoplites. {nl}You'll have no problems in becoming even stronger. So, are you ready for the next stage?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002509
text: Yes, that's the end of the spear I used to attack it back then.{nl}Now we can finally say it was us the Hoplites who defeated the beast.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002510
text: And of course, don't ask your friends to help you with this.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002511
text: I like your guts.{nl}Do me a favor and defeat the demons in Feretory Hills.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002512
text: After Medzio Diena, Feretory Hills has been crawling with demons.{nl}Go and defeat the demons there.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002513
text: Take this gem and go to Feretory Hills.{nl}After you injure the monsters, use the power of the gem to purify them.{nl}Then, bring back their ashes.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002514
text: This effectively proves your skills. {nl}Congratulations on reaching the last level of Krivis.{nl}I hope you will keep using your power to help those in need.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002515
text: Go to Braken Monastery 64_2 and you will see Sparnasman monsters.{nl}Defeat them in the XXX region and bring me their horns.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002516
text: I'm going to give you my energy.{nl}Use the energy at Feretory Hills and it will blend in with part of the monsters' spirits.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002517
text: Defeat the monsters with my energy imparted to collect their spirits, then bring them to me. {nl}Do this without the help of anyone.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002518
text: You seem ready.{nl}If so, go to the Apsimesti Crossroads without your shield and defeat the monsters there.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002519
text: You know you need to do this on your own, right?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002520
text: Are you any good with the spear now?{nl}If so, ger ready to become a true Cataphract.{nl}How's you companion's condition?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002521
text: Good. Imagine your arms are the spear that'll strike your opponents.{nl}And your legs are the companion that moves you around.{nl}Go to the Apsimesti Crossroads and defeat your enemies while mounted on your companion.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002522
text: I received a letter from Tesla!{nl}From what he wrote he seems to expect great things from you.{nl}Let's see if you've improved enough to live up to his expectations.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002523
text: The cities may be far from each other but there's always a fast way.{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002524
text: Thake this relic and go to Starving Demon's Way.{nl}Activate it at the Abandoned Altar in Hyth Cliff and the monsters will appear.{nl}I assume you know what to do next?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002525
text: The Abandoned Altar is by Hith Cliff in Starving Demon's Way.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002526
text: Good job. You're one step closer to the next level.{nl}I would be glad to introduce your talent to my uncle; he's busy working as a Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002527
text: At last, you're a true Rodelero now.{nl}But do you have what it takes to be a leader?{nl}Why don't you give it a try on the Colimencias at the Greene Manor?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002528
text: You're going to feel overwhelmed.{nl}But you need to know your weaknesses before you can reach the next Rodelero level.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002529
text: What was it like fighting such a strong opponent? Do you feel fit for a Rodelero?{nl}You're already a true Rodelero if you ask me.{nl}Keep up the good work.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002530
text: To become the best Cataphract you need a worthy opponent.{nl}The Gaigalas in Tenants' Farm and known for being the fiercest and most savage.{nl}Go there and defeat some.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002531
text: What you did was very impressive.{nl}As a Sadhu Master I look forward to your progress.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002532
text: You've improved quite a bit.{nl}It's time for you to be tested for the final stage.{nl}We need a way to prove your skills.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002533
text: And I think I know just the one.{nl}They say the Gaigalas in Tenants' Farm are some of the most unruly.{nl}Go there and defeat some to make sure they don't harm anyone else.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002534
text: I wondered if it wasn't too dangerous, but it seems I underestimated you.{nl}You're very impressive.{nl}I don't think anyone would doubt you're fit to become a high-level Paladin.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002535
text: Stop.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002536
text: Start!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002537
text: Start?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002538
text: Stop?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002539
text: I thought we might find Goddess Zemyna here but all I see are the dead...{nl}I've never seen anything like this. We need to find Zemyna.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002540
text: So we can't get near the relic...{nl}I understand keeping monsters and demons away, but why it's protected against people I don't know.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002541
text: What was that?{nl}It's so good to be safe again. I nearly returned to the goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002542
text: I should've known... it wasn't a relic of the goddess at all.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002543
text: I'm going to give you my records.{nl}Take them and destroy them; only then can I finally be at peace.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002544
text: I don't think... I've seen you before.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002545
text: Hm... That's good.{nl}If you can, will you please help me?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002546
text: I came running after the ferrets who stole our food and ended up here.{nl}But the ferrets attacked me and I couldn't get the food.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002547
