text: I need some first aid for my wounds...{nl}There's a herb at the Luvda Cliff that helps stop bleeding. Will you get some for me?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002548
text: The ferrets might attack again.{nl}These days it's like they think everything in the forest belongs to them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002549
text: Thank you so much for this favor.{nl}I'm going to get some rest and then go back to the workshop where the other people are.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002550
text: You're telling me you saw a girl being chased by a demon with an axe?{nl}That demon is probably Zaura; the girl I don't know.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002551
text: And he wants to stop the girl from meeting the Revelator...?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002552
text: That sounds suspicious.{nl}I need to tell the village about this.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002553
text: What?{nl}You're a Revelator?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002554
text: Did you come here after dreaming about a calamity?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002555
text: I wonder if...?{nl}I think you might just be the Revelator told in the story of our village.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002556
text: The story says... that when chaos takes over our village, a Revelator will dream of a calamity and come.{nl}They and their divine light will chase away evil and save the village.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002557
text: Those are the words of Goddess Laima that have been passed down.{nl}But... um...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002558
text: This isn't the right time.{nl}First I'm going to ask our village chief about this story.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002559
text: Meanwhile, please take back our food from the ferrets who stole it.{nl}You can bring it to our village chief at the Bellai Forest Workshop.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002560
text: Our people don't really trust outsiders but...{nl}We can't turn our back on help.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002561
text: Are you the Revelator Leja talked about?{nl}And that is... our stolen food.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002562
text: Thank you for taking back our food but...{nl}I don't think I can trust you just yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002563
text: Please understand.{nl}We were tricked by the demons once before, you see.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002564
text: Leja said she had somewhere else to be and left.{nl}I can't tell you where she is going, though.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002565
text: Like I said, we can't trust you just yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002566
text: We once had someone come to our village calling himself a Revelator.{nl}It was a man with a pale face and long hair.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002567
text: We thought our Revelator had finally arrived and did as the man said.{nl}Truth is, in reality... he was a demon.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002568
text: We believed the demon and because of that Goddess Lada was taken away...{nl}Even the ferrets turned violent.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002569
text: We think it was because of the totem the demon made us set up.{nl}We all want to join forces and rescue Goddess Lada, but we're worried about the ferret attacks.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002570
text: We can't even go near the totem because of its evil energy.{nl}But if you really are a Revelator, I'm sure you can use your divine power to destroy the totem.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002571
text: Show us.{nl}If you really are a Revelator...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002572
text: Please understand.{nl}I know Leja is glad the Revelator is finally here but...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002573
text: We've been fooled before, we can't help but be suspicious.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002574
text: You... you're a true Revelator, there's no doubt about it.{nl}I feel so sorry for how I treated you earlier... Please forgive this old man.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002575
text: Leja went to Zeraha to try and find something to help you.{nl}She said Goddess Laima will have left something prepared for the Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002576
text: There is a big statue of Goddess Laima there. {nl}It was sculpted a long time ago when She was still at our village.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002577
text: Oh, by the way... the girl came.{nl}Can I tell you about what happened in our village?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002578
text: Our village has always worshiped Goddess Laima.{nl}One day, She had a vision of a calamity that would strike the kingdom in a future far away.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002579
text: So, to stop this calamity, She decided to leave the village.{nl}Maybe She was worried about leaving us behind, so she had Goddess Lada look after us instead.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002580
text: But unlike what Goddess Laima predicted, our village remained peaceful.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002581
text: Then, unexpectedly, Medzio Diena happened.{nl}It was the calamity in Goddess Laima's vision.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002582
text: We weren't too affected by Medzio Diena, but that wasn't the end of it.{nl}Not long after, the river turned red.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002583
text: The river water caused terrible pain to everyone who drank it, and it made the fruit grow to an abnormal size.{nl}The fruit, just like the red water, was inedible.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002584
text: As if that weren't enough, the demons then came and took Goddess Lada.{nl}Just as Laima predicted... chaos took over the village.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002585
text: Leja probably told you... what Goddess Laima said to us.{nl}She said a Revelator would dream of the calamity and come with the light to chase away evil.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002586
text: We aren't sure what She meant by the light, but...{nl}Our elders used to say that a warm energy filled the village when Goddess Laima was here.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002587
text: It was all very quick.{nl}The moment that girl came to me, I felt the same warm energy our elders talked about.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002588
text: The girl looked me straight in the eyes and, without a word, she nodded.{nl}Then she disappeared towards Zeraha.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002589
text: Go, chase after the light.{nl}It can only have been sent here by Laima to guide you.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002590
text: Please, for Goddess Lada... and our village.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002591
text: That warm energy...{nl}Until the day I return to the goddess I will never be able to forget it.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002592
text: Go now.{nl}Follow the light and you will see the girl once again.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002593
text: Revelator, you didn't drink the red water, did you?{nl}I mean... If you had you probably wouldn't be here talking to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002594
text: Just don't drink the red water no matter how thirsty you are.{nl}The pain will kill you.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002595
text: The water is so toxic we can't even eat our fruit.{nl}It's not even the taste. When they first started to grow we were so glad but...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002596
text: But then, one day I got lost around the Menacing Lowlands and I was really thirsty. {nl}Then I noticed some fruit juice that belonged to the ferrets.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002597
text: I figured whether I died of thirst or at the hands of the ferrets I was doomed either way.{nl}So I drank the ferrets' juice and... I don't know, nothing happened.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002598
text: I don't know what they did but it looked like a good substitute for water.{nl}The water in the wells is starting to turn red too, you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002599
text: Would you get some of the ferrets' fruit juice?{nl}Please. We can't live with no water.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002600
text: I drank it expecting to die but surprisingly I didn't.{nl}It even tasted good.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002601
text: Wow, thank you.{nl}With this much juice I won't have to worry for quite some time.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002602
text: But, um...{nl}Sigh, those dogged ferrets...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002603
text: While you were getting the juice, the ferrets came and stole our food again.{nl}We get it back, they steal it... I'm fed up with this!{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002604
text: This has to stop.{nl}This time we need to put an end to the ferrets' bad habits.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002605
text: We need to find the food and give it some red water "seasoning".{nl}They're all going to be rolling on the floor in pain after they eat it.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002606
text: The water in the old well south from here is particularly red.{nl}Maybe you can spray the food with the water from there.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002607
text: Oh, make sure you spray it on the meat jerky hidden in the Banaga Forest Trail.{nl}Ferrets love meat jerky.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002608
text: We can't let them get away with this.{nl}We've put up with it long enough.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002609
text: It's darker than the grass around it and has wider leaves.{nl}If you go to Luvda Cliff you'll recognize it right away.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002610
text: I sure hope the ferrets won't come to steal our food again after this.{nl}It's a bit of a waste but... I hope they'll just eat it and leave us alone.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002611
text: Are you the Revelator who destroyed the totem?{nl}I wanted to thank you. It made me feel terrible every time I looked at it...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002612
text: Anyway, I went to check in on the ferrets and they're still vicious.{nl}It looks like the effects of the totem haven't faded yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002613
text: Widas, a man from our village, said he was planning to do something...{nl}He is a talented Dievdirbys after all.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002614
text: Will you ask Widas if the statue is finished?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002615
text: The totem is at the Banaga Forest Trail.{nl}If you really are a Revelator here with the light to save our village, getting the ferrets back to normal should be within your power.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002616
text: If you can prove that you are a Revelator, I will tell you about Leja.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002617
text: Oh, that? I'm so sorry about that.{nl}It's not the first time it happened, now it seems they're finding other people to bother.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002618
text: Just a moment.{nl}I'll give it to you right away.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002619
text: When I was little the ferrets would help us get back to the village whenever we got lost.{nl}But now we've been fooled by the demons... It's a shame.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002620
text: I made something based on the totem I built for that filthy demon.{nl}I made it so that it radiates good instead of evil energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002621
text: It's still only in testing phase, but it'll be worth something.{nl}Place this near the ferrets and watch their reaction.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002622
text: This is all our fault.{nl}We should have been more suspicious, but the name of Revelator got us hopeful.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002623
text: I wish this statue could bring peace between us and the ferrets.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002624
text: The ferrets are more violent?{nl}So I failed...?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002625
text: I'm so sorry. Are you sure you're not hurt?{nl}Ah... But I'm not going to quit.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002626
text: They're probably still brainwashed by the demons.{nl}We should ask Benes when he comes back from studying the ferrets in Zeraha.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002627
text: Revelator, you're late!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002628
text: Oh... I didn't know.{nl}I'm so sorry. I've talked to our village chief about it countless times but...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002629
text: What?{nl}You mean the girl could have been sent by Goddess Laima?{nl}I saw her running away from the ferrets to the Broken Bridge!{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002630
text: I wanted to chase after them but...{nl}The ferrets were so many, there was nothing I could do.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002631
text: We have no time to waste.{nl}We can still find the girl if we go after the ferrets now!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002632
text: I should have gone after them...{nl}I'm so worried now. I hope she's okay...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002633
text: Demon Lord Zaura took the girl?{nl}Oh no... Zaura is the one who had Goddess Lada taken away by demons in the past.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002634
text: Be careful when you collect Drowsy Herbs. {nl}There's a reason why they call them that.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002635
text: Oh, right.{nl}When Zaura took the girl, did you see any ferrets around?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002636
text: That means the ferrets are keeping the girl.{nl}They know the forest well, you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002637
text: I mean, I was born and raised here so I'm not clueless either.{nl}I think... I can guess where they're hiding her.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002638
text: It's too dangerous to just go out to save her without a plan, though.{nl}Things could get ugly if they start attacking.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002639
text: Right. I know a scent that makes ferrets lose their minds.{nl}Will you bring me some Drowsy Herbs so I can make some?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002640
text: This should be enough to make the scent.{nl}Hold on a minute.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002641
text: Don't worry if you accidentally get a whiff of the herbs.{nl}I made sure it only affects ferrets.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002642
text: Here's the scent.{nl}Let's see now... About the ferrets...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002643
text: There are a few ferret hideouts around the Balais Highway and the Zelbe Shelter.{nl}That's probably where they're keeping the girl.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002644
text: When you find the girl, throw the scent pouch I gave you.{nl}When the ferrets react to it, take the girl and come back!{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002645
text: Here...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002646
text: I hope my words can reach you...{nl}I am Laima, goddess of destiny and premonition.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002647
text: Before Medzio Diena, the goddesses lost much of their power.{nl}Because of this, Goddess Lada, unable to resist, was taken away by Demon Lord Zaura.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002648
text: Zaura is using the life force of Goddess Lada to create an evil contraption called Kruvina.{nl}The same Kruvina to which countless lives were sacrificed in Castlefield.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002649
text: The evil energy of Kruvina can make objects grow.{nl}Depending on how it is used, it can enhance the power of the demons, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002650
text: By the time I had a vision of this horrible future, it was too late to do anything.{nl}That's why... I sent a young girl to meet you.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002651
text: Only one person can free this forest from the calamity that fell upon it...{nl}A savior among the Revelators. You.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002652
text: Take this orb...{nl}Goddess Lada is being held captive at the Seir Rainforest. Please, rescue her and stop the demons' plans...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002653
text: An outsider...? Hm, you'll have to do.{nl}Hey, um... will you give me a hand?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002654
text: I'm trying to figure out why the ferrets are siding with the demons.{nl}So I found a way to turn into one and talk to them.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002655
text: Thing is, they've seen me too many times already.{nl}Even when I turn into a ferret, they recognize my smell and start attacking me.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002656
text: If that's okay with you, will you turn into a ferret and snoop around for me?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002657
text: I'm going to make a transformation scroll from the information we collect.{nl}Write everything down. You can't act too awkward as a ferret.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002658
text: Your observations are pretty detailed.{nl}You should be ready to transform now. Hold on.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002659
text: Here you go.{nl}The transformation scroll is ready.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002660
text: From your observations I don't think you'll be awkward at all.{nl}I trust that you'll be comfortable talking to the ferrets.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002661
text: See if you can find out why the ferrets are siding with the demons.{nl}Don't forget to turn into a ferret first with the scroll.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002662
text: If the scroll wears out in front of the ferrets they'll come at you, so be careful.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002663
text: Hm? So what you're saying is...{nl}The ferrets are helping the demons on purpose?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002664
text: How does...{nl}I can't believe it!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002665
text: Did the ferrets really say that?{nl}I know you have no reason to lie, but still...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002666
text: I really can't believe it, though.{nl}The ferrets have always been nothing but friendly.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002667
text: I need to see if they at least still feel some compassion to humans.{nl}I'll try and enchant a piece of wood to look like someone injured.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002668
text: The wood is going to look like someone who's hurt to whoever looks at it.{nl}Place it close to the ferrets and see if they attack.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002669
text: Will they attack someone if they're injured? {nl}Nah... If they do, it's even more serious than I thought...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002670
text: They really attacked the piece of wood?{nl}That's a bad sign. It means they're attacking anyone and everyone...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002671
text: There's no doubt after this experiment.{nl}The ferrets are very, very dangerous now.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002672
text: Still, there's no way I can fight all those ferrets.{nl}The most I can do is chase away the ones closest to the village.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002673
text: There's a type of strong scent that ferrets hate.{nl}If we make a fire and burn this scent, that should keep the ferrets away.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002674
text: Would you spread the scent around the Bellai Forest Workshop?{nl}It smells a bit... foul, but please do me this favor.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002675
text: I should make more of the scent.{nl}In case the effect wears out.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002676
text: Thanks.{nl}I don't think the ferrets are going to go near the workshop now.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002677
text: It makes me mad to think the ferrets are using the scent thanks to the demons' dirty tricks.{nl}I should talk to Widas when I go back.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002678
text: But I still think there has to be a way to make the ferrets go back to normal.{nl}R-right...?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002679
text: You...{nl}You've finally saved me.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002680
text: When Laima entrusted this forest to me...{nl}She said it would be consumed by a wave of calamity.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002681
text: And, she said, after the wave has washed away, I would meet you.{nl}The one holding the light of salvation...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002682
text: You are the one, the Revelator who will save our world...{nl}I have hope that it will be you now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002683
text: The reason behind the red water flowing in this forest and the contaminated crops...{nl}The plan to grow a giant bracken and spread the death spores...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002684
text: All of that was possible because of the Kruvina.{nl}But their schemes didn't end there.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002685
text: After the experiment yielded good results, the demons wanted to create a Kruvina that was even more powerful.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002686
text: Their plan was to use not human lives...{nl}But mine. The life force of a goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002687
text: There cannot be a weapon like the Kruvina in our world.{nl}Only you can destroy the Kruvina and stop the demons' plans. {nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002688
text: Demon Lord Zaura is gravely injured; now is your chance!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002689
text: The Kruvina may be unfinished...{nl}But the fact that it uses my life force means it cannot be destroyed by human powers.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002690
text: There is only one way...{nl}I need to impart my power on the orb Laima gave you...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002691
text: Alas, most of my power was stolen from me during Medzio Diena, and what was left of it is with the Kruvina device.{nl}If only that power is released... I can use it to help you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002692
text: You did well.{nl}With the production stopped, the Kruvina cannot be completed.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002693
text: Even an unfinished Kruvina is too dangerous for this world, however...{nl}It needs to be destroyed before the demons make use of it.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002694
text: Whatever little power I have recovered, I will entrust it unto you.{nl}You have one chance... Please, destroy the Kruvina.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002695
text: Before transforming into a ferret, you need to study their behavior.{nl}They're going to know something's up if you act weird.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002696
text: I'm going to give you an empty scroll so you can take notes on the ferrets.{nl}After that you can transform.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002697
text: Demon Lord Zaura will never stand for this.{nl}May you be blessed in the name of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002698
text: The Kruvina... is in the hands of the demons.{nl}I'm glad you, savior, were able to return in safety.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002699
text: Don't blame yourself.{nl}This is not your fault.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002700
text: If you hadn't stopped the demons' plans, they would have completed the Kruvina.{nl}I believe Laima will be aware of this, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002701
text: That feat alone was immensely important for us.{nl}No one can blame you...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002702
text: Laima...{nl}How despairing it must have been for her, knowing she was powerless to change what would happen.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002703
text: I imagine that's why she took it upon herself and drifted away.{nl}To find a solution for this calamity... she had no choice but to walk a lonely path.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002704
text: Oh...!{nl}I just heard Laima's voice.{nl}She was calling out for you...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002705
text: I think it's Laima's statue in Zeraha.{nl}You should go there.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002706
text: Her voice was calling out for you, yearning.{nl}Hurry and go to the statue of Goddess Laima in Zeraha.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002707
text: Laima...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002708
text: She gave me a sad smile and walked away.{nl}She knew what would happen... And yet, she made a difficult choice...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002709
text: Seeing you now, I can try to understand the reason behind her choice.{nl}The meaning of a savior... what she saw at the end of this catastrophe.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002710
text: You said Laima asked you to find the revelations.{nl}The one closest from here will be in Fedimian.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002711
text: I understand the weight of this task, but we must act now.{nl}It has to be you... No one but you can save Laima.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002712
text: I will pass onto you the power of Laima's orb.{nl}Let it guide you to the revelation she has hidden.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002713
text: Please, save Laima...{nl}Rescue her from the hands of Giltine...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002714
text: You were brought here by destiny!{nl}Thank you, thank you for rescuing Goddess Lada.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002715
text: Someday I'm going to rebuild a temple for Goddess Lada and Goddess Laima, when they return.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002716
text: But the demons will not give up.{nl}And Lada's condition itself is still unstable.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002717
text: We would like to chase away the demons left around here, would you help?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002718
text: Goddess Lada is still not feeling well.{nl}We'll look after Her now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002719
text: Thank you.{nl}There are a lot less demons around now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002720
text: Now we need to purify the land contaminated by evil energy.{nl}But I don't know how.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002721
text: This wasn't even the work of demons, but a human...{nl}Widas can't seem to find a solution right away, either.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002722
text: Not far from here there's a big city called Fedimian.{nl}I wonder if there is a master there who could come up with something.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002723
text: Of course I would go there myself but...{nl}We're short-handed as it is here, I don't think it would be right for me to leave.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002724
text: If you can, I would like you to go to Fedimian and ask the masters there for advice.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002725
text: So the land was contaminated not by demons, but a human...{nl}With the world as it is, who would have thought...?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002726
text: I have a solution. I'm going to write you a purification scroll.{nl}That should be enough to solve the problem.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002727
text: One of the masters in Fedimian should be able to help us!{nl}I hope so...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002728
text: You're back already.{nl}Did... you find a master to help us?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002729
text: The Druid Master wrote this scroll herself? {nl}That's even better than I expected. Thank you!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002730
text: I found the source of the contamination.{nl}The demons set up another totem.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002731
text: This purification scroll should do it but...{nl}With the demons guarding it, I can't get close enough to the totem.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002732
text: Will you destroy the demon totem and purify it with the scroll?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002733
text: I can't understand why someone would side with the demons...{nl}How powerful is their evil energy, that even ferrets can't handle it?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002734
text: Revelator, your help has given us new hope. {nl}We couldn't have solved this without you...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002735
text: After the new temple is completed, feel free to come by again, Revelator!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002736
text: Our people feel safe now that everything's come to an end...{nl}You really are our savior. Thank you, thank you!{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002737
text: Our people are going to join forces and build a temple for the goddesses now.{nl}By the way, I was looking around the Irbedi Cliff for a spot to build the temple and I found a place with a strong vital force.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002738
text: I couldn't do much more because of the demons...{nl}But the energy of that land, I'm sure it'll help Goddess Lada recover Hers.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002739
text: So I want to ask you.{nl}They say this seed grows a flower that takes on whatever properties of the land where it's planted.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002740
text: If we plant it on that land, the flower too will have the same life force.{nl}Will you bring that flower to Goddess Lada?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002741
text: I have never felt a force so powerful.{nl}I only hope this flower can heal the wounds in Goddess Lada's body and spirit...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002742
text: Even if it happened in accordance with Laima's prophecy, I have fallen and left the townspeople helpless and worried..{nl}My gratitude cannot be expressed through mere words...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002743
text: And this flower is filled with great life force...{nl}My recovery won't take long with this. Again, thank you...{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002744
text: Thank you.{nl}May you be blessed by all the living beings in this forest...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002745
text: If only I can escape the Redemption Ward... I can get my energy back.{nl}Please hurry...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002746
text: The Kruvina is still being produced.{nl}You need to hurry...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002747
text: Please lend me just a little more of your strength.{nl}Only you can do this.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002748
text: A human sided with the demons...{nl}With the world as it is, who would have thought...?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002749
text: I... feel my conscience fading away...{nl}Hurry and destroy the three devices... before the Kruvina is completed.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002750
text: Fortunately, should I say... those devices were made by a human...{nl}Your abilities should be enough to destroy them.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002751
text: The Redemption Ward first...{nl}Please, before I lose my senses...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002752
text: You... destroyed the Redemption Ward.{nl}I'm fine. I'm just a little dizzy.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002753
text: Now only the vitality absorption device and the suppressor are left.{nl}If you destroy the vitality absorption device, you'll stop the production of the Kruvina.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002754
text: The device was made to absorb only the vitality of the goddesses...{nl}If it absorbs that of another being it will shut down.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002755
text: Demon blood, especially, is opposite to my nature, and it will cause an ever stronger reaction on the device.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002756
text: You really are Laima's chosen one...{nl}I feel like I'm regaining my energy a little now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002757
text: Finally, the Kruvina suppressor.{nl}That's the device that collects my vitality and supplies it to the Kruvina.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002758
text: That much is operated by the demons' magic power alone.{nl}Use Laima's orb to overload the device.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002759
text: Fedimian is a really big city.{nl}Especially because it's close to the Great Cathedral, it's a common destination for pilgrims.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002760
text: Fedimian, too, was afected by Medzio Diena...{nl}But even though the business district was destroyed, a surprising number of people survived.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002761
text: People there think it was because Fedimian is in the divine area where the the great statue of Goddess Austeja is.{nl}Now they're hard at work to rebuild the city.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002762
text: Go down at the Kraijwi Crossings and you should see Fedimian.{nl}Alright then, I look forward to hear good news from you!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002763
text: I'm very glad to hear that.{nl}The totems are close to the Inega Vacant Lot and in the Odur Backyard.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002764
text: The girl disappeared with the light.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002765
text: Elder Eloizard

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002766
text: You must quite talented, coming all the way over here.{nl}I'm the chief of a village downstream from this lake.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002767
text: We came up here to try and find out why the lake turned red.{nl}I looked around for a while but as I was about to go back I got my path blocked by monsters.{nl}If that's all right, will you give me a hand?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002768
text: Please.{nl}I just need you to clear out some monsters around here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002769
text: Samsonas

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002770
text: You're the traveler?{nl}I'm going to pray to the goddesses to make the lake clean again. {nl}Before the lake was contaminated I once saw people make offerings to an obelisk around here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002771
text: You're the traveler?{nl}I'm going to pray to the goddesses to make the lake clean again. {nl}Before the lake was contaminated I once saw people make offerings to an obelisk around here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002772
text: Please do me this favor.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002773
text: You got it! Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002774
text: Nikodemas

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002775
text: You wouldn't happen to have seen a young man around here?{nl}He said he was just going somewhere but hasn't been back since.{nl}Someone saw him head to the Absenta Reservoir.{nl}If you're going that way, would you look for him?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002776
text: It'll be okay, I hope...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002777
text: Isolated Youth

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002778
text: Thank you.{nl}I was being chased by that huge monster and had to hide here, but it wouldn't move, so I was stuck.{nl}You saved me.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002779
text: Is everything all right with him?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002780
text: Scalvis

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002781
text: So you're the traveler who helped our chief. {nl}After the lake was contaminated there's more monsters around and we're afraid they'll hurt someone.{nl}Will you clear out some around here?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002782
text: Hopefully we won't run into trouble before we go back to the village.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002783
text: Thank you for your help.{nl}I hope we can all return safely.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002784
text: The contaminated lake is a big problem.{nl}We really need to hurry and find a solution...

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002785
text: Lately there's a lot more monsters around, this area is dangerous now.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002786
text: We came up all together but it's too dangerous here.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002787
text: Thanks to you I was able to come back to my people.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002788
text: Hm...?{nl}Why is the ground shaking?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002789
text: I should go, something could have happened to the villagers.{nl}I apologize if I'm being a little shameless, but would you help us some more?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002790
text: Where?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002791
text: That has nothing to do with me

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002792
text: I'll help you find your colleagues

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002793
text: Let's go back to Rose

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002794
text: What are the symptoms?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002795
text: Tell the Cleric Submaster about Herbalist Tales' symptoms

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002796
text: Giving the medicine to Herbalist Tales

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002797
text: Keep looking

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002798
text: I'll talk to the village resident

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002799
text: We should hurry

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002800
text: I'll find the XX essence

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002801
text: Let's do it later

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002802
text: I'll help you

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002803
text: I can't help her

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002804
text: I'll check whether I have a recovery potion

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002805
text: I'll give you one later

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002806
text: I'll defeat the demons around here

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002807
text: I ought to run away, then

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002808
text: I'll find their belongings

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002809
text: You find them yourself

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002810
text: I'll look for them later

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002811
text: I'll go into the room

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002812
text: I'll switch off the confinement device

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002813
text: Ask someone else for help

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002814
text: I'll go find your backpack

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002815
text: I'll find it myself

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002816
text: I'll head to the experiment site

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002817
text: I'll go later

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002818
text: I'll get back the holy relic

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002819
text: I'll set up the holy relic

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_002820
text: I'll set it up myself

text: The villager says that the red water from the river has contaminated their fruit, but that the ferrets might know a way of making them safe to eat. Collect fruit juice from the ferrets.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003085
text: Deliver to the Villager

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003086
text: Collect %s from the ferrets

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003087
text: Take the red water from the Old Well

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003088
text: The villager is planning to contaminate the food stolen by the ferrets with red water. First, get some red water from the old well.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003089
text: Contaminate the Stolen Food With Red Water

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003090
text: The village resident asked you to contaminate the ferrets' meat jerky with the red water.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003091
text: You found the meat jerky and used the red water to contaminate it. Return to the villager.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003092
text: The village chief's grandson is back from checking up on the ferrets after the totem was destroyed. He seems disapponted. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003093
text: Dievdirbys Widas says he carved a statue that radiates good energy based on the totem he made for the demons. Talk to Widas again.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003094
text: Set up Widas' Statue close to the ferrets

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003095
text: Dievdirbys Widas says he carved a statue that radiates good energy based on the totem he made for the demons. Set up Widas' statue close to the ferrets and watch their reaction.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003096
text: After raising Widas' statue arround the ferrets, they became unexpectedly more violent. Tell Widas about this.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003097
text: Follow the girl in the direction she's headed.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003098
text: The girl left visible traces. Follow her trace to find her.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003099
text: Follow the Girl

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003100
text: The girl seems to be telling you to follow her downwards. Keep following her.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003101
text: While chasing the girl, you met Druid Leja. Ask Leja about the girl's whereabouts.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003102
text: Druid Leja says the girl was being chased by ferrets. Defeat the ferrets and rescue the girl.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003103
text: The mysterious girl was taken by Demon Lord Zaura. Discuss this with Druid Leja.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003104
text: Defeat the ferrets

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003105
text: The Demon Lord took the girl and disappeared. Discuss with Druid Leja about what to do next.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003106
text: Druid Leja believes the ferrets are hiding the girl. She asks you to bring some Drowsy Herbs for her to make an incense to use on the ferrets.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003107
text: Deliver the Drowsy Herbs to Druid Leja

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003108
text: Druid Leja has created an incense able to put the ferrets in a trance. Ask Druid Leja about the possible location of the girl and the ferrets.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003109
text: Rescue the Kidnapped Girl from the Ferret Hideout

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003110
text: The girl kidnapped by the ferrets needs to be rescued. Throw the bag of incense to leave the ferrets disoriented, then take your chance and rescue the girl.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003111
text: The girl kidnapped by the ferrets needs to be rescued. Burst the bag of incense to leave the ferrets disoriented, then take your chance and rescue the girl.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003112
text: The mysterious girl started running as soon as you freed her. Follow her trace to where she is.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003113
text: You have found the girl by the great Goddess Statue. Talk to the mysterious girl.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003114
text: The mysterious girl is pointing to a shiny sapling. Talk to the mysterious girl.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003115
text: Investigate the Shiny Sapling

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003116
text: The mysterious girl is pointing to a shiny sapling. Have a look at the sapling.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003117
text: Druid Benes is looking for someone to help with his research. Talk to Druid Benes.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003118
text: Druid Benes has asked you to observe the behavior patterns of the ferrets for him. Use an empty scroll arround the ferrets to take notes.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003119
text: You have written down the behavior patterns of the ferrets on the blank scroll. Bring it to Benes.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003120
text: The ferret transformation scroll given by Druid Benes allows you to turn into a ferret. Transform into one and find out why they have sided with the demons and are attacking humans.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003121
text: The reason ferrets have started to attack humans is because the demons have made them stronger. Tell Druid Benes about this.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003122
text: Place the Voodooed Wooden Piece and observe the ferrets' reaction

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003123
text: Druid Benes has asked you to set up the voodooed piece of wood shaped like an injured villager and watch the ferrets' reaction to it.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003124
text: The ferrets seem to attack all humans indiscriminately. Ask Druid Benes about what to do next.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003125
text: Chase away the ferrets around the Bellai Forest Workshop with the repellent

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003126
text: Benes has asked you to spread a smelly repellent around the Bellai Forest Worskshop to chase away the ferrets.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003127
text: key to enter Rest Mode and use the firewood to set up a bonfire and spread the odor.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003128
text: Report to Druid Benes

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003129
text: You have chased away the ferrets with a repellent. Return to Druid Benes.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003130
text: Look for Goddess Lada

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003131
text: Goddess Laima has asked you to rescue Goddess Lada from the demons and thwart their plans.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003132
text: Goddess Laima has asked you to rescue Goddess Lada from the demons and thwart their plans. She is being held captive by Demon Lord Zaura in the Seir Rainforest. Go find her.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003133
text: Demon Lord Zaura may have escaped, but the force around Goddess Lada has disappeared. Talk to Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003134
text: While battling Demon Lord Zaura, the force around Goddess Lada seems to have disappeared. Talk to Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003135
text: Goddess Lada says that, before destroying the Kruvina, you need to destroy the devices attached to Her. Talk to Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003136
text: Rescue Goddess Lada and ask Her how to thwart the demons' schemes.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003137
text: Destroy the Redemption Ward

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003138
text: Goddess Lada seems to be losing Her conscience. Try and destroy the Redemption Wards closest to Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003139
text: You have destroyed all Redemption Wards. Ask Goddess Lada whether She is all right.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003140
text: You have destroyed the Redemption Wards keeping Goddess Lada captive. Talk to Her.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003141
text: Goddess Lada believes that adding demon blood to the vitality absorption device will cause it to reverse and become deactivated.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003142
text: You have collected enough demon blood. Apply it to the vitality absorption device.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003143
text: Defeat demons and collect %s

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003144
text: You have destroyed all the Kruvina devices. Talk to Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003145
text: Goddess Lada says even an incomplete Kruvina can be used for evil and thinks it should be destroyed.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003146
text: Demon Lord Zaura may have been defeated, but an intruding beholder has stolen the Kruvina. Return to Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003147
text: Go to the Statue of Goddess Laima in Zeraha

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003148
text: Goddess Lada says She heard the voice of Goddess Laima calling for you. Go to the statue of Goddess Laima in Zeraha.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003149
text: On approaching the great statue of Goddess Laima, you saw She is being hurt by Giltine. Laima has asked you to find all the revelations. Tell Goddess Lada about this.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003150
text: The village priest wants to rebuild the fallen temple to prepare for the return of Goddesses Laima and Lada. But first, you need to clear out the demons and purify the contaminated land. The village priest hopes you can help chase the demons away.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003151
text: Find a Master in Fedimian Who Might Know About Purification

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003152
text: The village priest wants to purify the land contaminated with evil energy, but they aren't sure what to do, as it was contaminated on purpose. Go to Fedimian and ask the Masters there for advice on land purification.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003153
text: You have obtained a Purification Scroll from the Druid Master in Fedimian. Talk to the village priest.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003154
text: The village priest thinks the demon totems could be the cause of the contamination and wants you to destroy the ones in the Inega Vacant Lot and Odur Backyard, then use the scroll to purify the land there.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003155
text: The great priest of the village has asked you to plant the Earth Flower seeds and deliver the flower to Goddess Lada

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003156
text: Deliver to Goddess Lada

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003157
text: The Earth Flower has blossomed. Bring it to Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003158
text: Talk to Nikodemas

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003159
text: Nikodemas is looking for help.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003160
text: Look for the Missing Person

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003161
text: Look for the person that has been missing.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003162
text: Talk to the Isolated Youth

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003163
text: Check whether the isolated youth is all right.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003164
text: Talk to Scalvis

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003165
text: Scalvis is looking for help.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003166
text: Defeat monsters nearby

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003167
text: Defeat monsters nearby to keep the villagers safe.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151102_003168
text: Report the results to Scalvis.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003169
text: Stone of Requests

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003170
text: The Magic Association is accepting monster samples from all regions for research purposes.{nl}We appreciate your collaboration.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003171
text: Your samples will be carefully studied by the Magic Association.{nl}Thank you for helping.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003172
text: A Necromancer needs a well-trained spirit to resist being damaged by evil energy.{nl}Fight me and show me just how strong is your spirit.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003173
text: There's a job from the Linker Master I really don't want to miss.{nl}If you do this job for me, I'll show you how to use physic powers. What do you say?

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003174
text: Impressive!{nl}Enough of the Linker Master now, you and I have some psychic power talk to do.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003175
text: There should be a Hallowventer around here with the key...{nl}That's odd.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003176
text: Are you sure you're not hurt?{nl}The next tombstone is on the way to Dykyne Fork.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003177
text: Before I teach you, I can help you get a taste of what real combat is like.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003178
text: Magic Association Collection Request

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003179
text: Looking forward to cooperate.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003180
text: I don't think I can help.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003181
text: Check the Stone of Requests

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003182
text: Check the Magic Association's Stone of Requests.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003183
text: Obtain Monster Samples

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003184
text: The Stone of Requests asks you to collect samples from monsters. Defeat nearby monsters and collect any parts that can be used as specimens.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003185
text: Report to the Stone of Requests

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003186
text: You have collected enough monster samples. Bring them to the Stone of Requests.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003187
text: Talk to the Hoplite Submaster

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003188
text: Go see the Hoplite Submaster at the West Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003189
text: Gathered all the materials needed to prove your determination to become stronger. Return to the Hoplite Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003190
text: Talk to the Psychokino Submaster

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003191
text: Find the Psychokino Master at the Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003192
text: The Psychokino Master told you that he is interested in this field and asked you to become his assistant. Obtain the Desmodus Tail Pins in Tenet Church B1 requested by the Psychokino Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003193
text: Deliver to the Psychokino Submaster

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003194
text: Acquired enough Desmodus Tail Pins. Return to the Psychokino Master and give them to him.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003195
text: Talk to the Linker Submaster

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003196
text: Find the Linker Master at the Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003197
text: The Linker Master is emphasizing the importance of the ability to open one's mind as a Linker. To test your competence as a Linker, obtain Corylus Cores and Galok Blood in Tenet Church 1F.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003198
text: Deliver the Materials to the Linker Submaster

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003199
text: You have collected all materials needed for the experiment. Deliver them to the Linker Submaster.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003200
text: You have defeated the Throneweaver that was destroying the owl statues. Go back and talk to the sad owl.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003201
text: Keep talking to Merrisa about the relic.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20151224_003202
text: You seem to have found the relic. Bring it to Merrisa.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160718_003203
text: I can see your passion, but what about your abilities? {nl}Bring me Phyracon Fragments and Green Drake Scales from the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160718_003204
text: To prove your determination to be stronger, please collect Glizardon's Leather in Tenet Church B1, Galok's Canines in 1F, and Black Powders from Egnomes in 2F. To find Tenet Church, head to Srautus Gorge and pass through Gele Plateau.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160718_003205
text: The Psychokino Master told you that he is interested in this field and asked you to become his assistant. Firstly, get to Tenet Church by passing through Srautus Gorge and Gele Plateau. Once you arrive there, obtain the Desmodus Tail Pins in Tenet Church B1 requested by the Psychokino Master.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160718_003206
text: The Linker Master is emphasizing the importance of the ability to open one's mind as a Linker. Firstly, get to Tenet Church by passing through Srautus Gorge and Gele Plateau. There, test your competence as a Linker, obtain Corylus Cores and Galok Blood in Tenet Church 1F.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160718_003207
text: A Sword and Shield for the People [Highlander Advancement]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160718_003208
text: Disturbance of the Winged Beast [Peltasta Advancement]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160718_003209
text: The Highlander Master seems very sorry, but you can't give up. Talk to the Highlander Master again.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160718_003210
text: The First Arrow [Archer Advancement]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160718_003211
text: Path of the Healer [Cleric Advancement]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160718_003212
text: Eternal Worship [Krivis Advancement]

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160811_003213
text: I didn't think you would be able to defeat him..{nl}You are much stronger than I thought. I'm impressed.{nl}I think that retaking the monastery will be an easy task with you helping us.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160811_003214
text: Storage Room's Suspicious Secret Device

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160811_003215
text: Letters from Prison (2)

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160811_003216
text: Check the Secret Device on the way to Supply Depot Number 1

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160811_003217
text: There is a Secret Device on the way to Supply Depot Number 1. This time, make sure to check what type of device it is.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160811_003218
text: Destroy the Ice Crystals that appeared next to the Secret Device

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20160811_003219
text: This Secret Device was a trap. Destroy all the Ice Crystals that appeared nearby!

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003220
text: If you want to reach higher stages as a Krivis. Go to the goddess statue in Fedimian.{nl}Pilgrimage is a rite of passage.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003221
text: You took less time than I expected. You are good.{nl}I want to welcome not just as a mentor and a trainee but as comrades.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003222
text: If I can get ahold of sterdy wood materials from the center of Petrified City, I could give any wishes...{nl}Perhaps grant the teachings of Dievdirbys.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003223
text: Some of the devices at the outter wall are quite dangerous.{nl}I am worried if the monsters could mishandle them and create a huge problem.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003224
text: Is that true?{nl}That's good to hear.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003225
text: While investigating this place, I was in constat fear.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003226
text: That's a relief.{nl}I hope that would be the end of that.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003227
text: My word, the monsters were hiding.{nl}But it's a relieft that you are safe.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003228
text: Operation Outter Wall Core Retrieval(1)

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003229
text: Talking with other Kupoles

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003230
text: Monsters look awfully aggressive.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003231
text: Meh, they look mostly harmless.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003232
text: Preserve the Evidence of the Outter Wall

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003233
text: Let's escape it before that happens.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003234
text: Operation Outter Wall Core Retrieval

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003235
text: Talk to Kupole Milda

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003236
text: The core at the outter wall needs some inspecting. Talkt to Kupole Milda at the Outter Wall District 9.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003237
text: Kupole Milda says that the core is heavily protected by several means and monsters are large in number

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003238
text: You've have reduced the number of nearby monsters to a certain degree. Report to Kupole Milda

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003239
text: Kupole Milda seems to have something to say. Talk to Kupole Milda.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003240
text: Defeat Monsters in the Outter Wall District 9

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003241
text: Kupole Milda says that the devices at the outter wall can be dangerous if monsters mishandle them. Defeat the monsters before they do any harm.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003242
text: Report to Kupole Milda

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161005_003243
text: Enough monsters have been slain. Report to Kupole Milda.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003244
text: Baron Munchausen

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003245
text: Ah! You must be drawn to here by my ever-expanding reputation!{nl}Yes, I am THE Baron Munchausen.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003246
text: You probably want to be my understydt.{nl}But, a great man like me must be selective of whom I should take under my wings.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003247
text: Hmm, if you insist, I will give one chance.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003248
text: Don't be shy, the youngling.{nl}It's a simple test of skills.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003249
text: The reports of ghosts harassing people in the East Siauliai Woods.{nl}Exorcising ghosts is my specialty but I do want to give you this opportunity to prove yourself.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003250
text: In the East Woods, you will come across boxes of supplies around the supplies camp.{nl}It's the contents of the boxes that keep disappearing. The ghosts are, ipso facto, responsible for this naughty occurences.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003251
text: I will give you this holy powder. Sprinkle it on the boxes and let those darn ghosts know their places.{nl}I have high expectations of you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003252
text: Now, the young one, prove what I see in you is right.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003253
text: You came back.{nl}How did it go?{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003254
text: A weaver?{nl}I told you it was the ghosts.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003255
text: The ghosts got weakened by my powder and they called upon the monster.{nl}You've passed your first test, the young one.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20161214_003256
text: You should be proud, you did pass the test given forth by the GREAT Munchausen.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20170330_003257
text: I can see your passion, but what about your abilities? {nl}Bring me Phyracon Fragments and Red Infrorocktor Shell Fragments from the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20170330_003258
text: The Wizard Master considers effort as the most important. Collect Phyracon Fragments and Red Infrorocktor Shell Fragments from the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20170330_003259
text: Red Infrorocktor Shell Fragment

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20170330_003260
text: Use the provoking orb at the Penitence Route in the Great Cathedral

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20170330_003261
text: The Swordsman Master taught you that courage to protect allies is very important. Provoke the monsters using the provoking orb at the Penitence Route in the Great Cathedral and defeat them.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20170330_003262
text: Gather Charcoal Stones from Penitence Route

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20170330_003263
text: The Fletcher Master is asking you to gather good quality Charcoal Stones. Get them from Penitence Route.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20180418_003264
text: How many times has this happened already?{nl}I am sorry but please go meet with the Fletcher Master to find out what happened.{nl}Try going to the Goddess' Ancient Garden.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20180418_003265
text: Did you not hear me?{nl}It will be some time before it's your turn.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20190104_003266
text: Your samples will be carefully studied by the Magic Association.{nl}Thank you for helping.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20190104_003267
text: It was very difficult for us, as monsters kept destroying the Stone of Requests, but thankfully you helped.{nl}The samples you have brought will be carefully studied by the Magic Association.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20190104_003268
text: Klaipeda

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20190104_003269
text: Talk to

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20190104_003270
text: Henrika of Klaipeda's Magic Association

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20190104_003271
text: You have enough monster samples.{nl}

name: QUEST_UNUSED_20190104_003272
text: Return to the NPC.
